2902  //if( cg.snap->ps.weaponstate != WEAPON_FIRING && cg.snap->ps.weaponstate != WEAPON_RELOADING ) {
2903  if (weaponNum == WP_M7 /*|| weaponNum == WP_CARBINE*/)
2904  {
2905  barrel.hModel = weapon->missileModel;
2906  CG_PositionEntityOnTag(&barrel, &barrel, "tag_prj", 0, NULL);
2907  CG_AddWeaponWithPowerups(&barrel, cent->currentState.powerups, ps, cent);
2908  }
2909  }
2910  else if ((GetWeaponTableData(weaponNum)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLE) && (GetWeaponTableData(weaponNum)->type & (WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPABLE | WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPED)))
2911  {
2912  // the holder
2913  barrel.hModel = weapon->modModels[2];
2914  CG_PositionEntityOnTag(&barrel, &gun, "tag_scope", 0, NULL);
2915  CG_AddWeaponWithPowerups(&barrel, cent->currentState.powerups, ps, cent);
2916  }
2917  else if (GetWeaponTableData(weaponNum)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_MG)
2918  {
2919  barrel.hModel = weapon->modModels[0];
2920  barrel.frame = GetWeaponTableData(weaponNum)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SETTABLE;
2921  CG_PositionEntityOnTag(&barrel, &gun, "tag_bipod", 0, NULL);
2922  CG_AddWeaponWithPowerups(&barrel, cent->currentState.powerups, ps, cent);
2923  }
2924  }
2925 
2926  // make sure we aren't looking at cg.predictedPlayerEntity for LG
2927  nonPredictedCent = &cg_entities[cent->currentState.clientNum];
2928 
2929  // if the index of the nonPredictedCent is not the same as the clientNum
2930  // then this is a fake player (like on the single player podiums), so
2931  // go ahead and use the cent
2932  if ((nonPredictedCent - cg_entities) != cent->currentState.clientNum)
2933  {
2934  nonPredictedCent = cent;
2935  }
2936 
2937  // add the flash
2938  Com_Memset(&flash, 0, sizeof(flash));
2939  VectorCopy(parent->lightingOrigin, flash.lightingOrigin);
2940  flash.shadowPlane = parent->shadowPlane;
2941  flash.renderfx = parent->renderfx;
2942 
2943  flash.hModel = weapon->flashModel[modelViewType];
2944 
2945  angles[YAW] = 0;
2946  angles[PITCH] = 0;
2947  angles[ROLL] = crandom() * 10;
2948  AnglesToAxis(angles, flash.axis);
2949 
2950  if (/*isPlayer &&*/ GetWeaponTableData(weaponNum)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_AKIMBO)
2951  {
2952  if (!ps || cg.renderingThirdPerson)
2953  {
2954  if (!cent->akimboFire)
2955  {
2956  CG_PositionRotatedEntityOnTag(&flash, parent, "tag_weapon");
2957  VectorMA(flash.origin, 10, flash.axis[0], flash.origin);
2958  }
2959  else
2960  {
2961  CG_PositionRotatedEntityOnTag(&flash, &gun, "tag_flash");
2962  }
2963  }
2964  else
2965  {
2966  if (!cent->akimboFire)
2967  {
2968  CG_PositionRotatedEntityOnTag(&flash, parent, "tag_flash2");
2969 
2970  }
2971  else
2972  {
2973  CG_PositionRotatedEntityOnTag(&flash, parent, "tag_flash");
2974  }
2975  }
2976  }
2977  else
2978  {
2979  CG_PositionRotatedEntityOnTag(&flash, &gun, "tag_flash");
2980  }
2981 
2982  // store this position for other cgame elements to access
2983  cent->pe.gunRefEnt = gun;
2984  cent->pe.gunRefEntFrame = cg.clientFrame;
2985 
2986  if (weaponNum == WP_FLAMETHROWER && (nonPredictedCent->currentState.eFlags & EF_FIRING))
2987  {
2988  // continuous flash
2989  }
2990  else
2991  {
2992  // continuous smoke after firing
2993  if (ps || !isFirstPerson)
2994  {
2995  if (GetWeaponTableData(weaponNum)->maxHeat)
2996  {
2997  // hot smoking gun
2998  if ((cg.time - cent->overheatTime < 3000) && !(cent->currentState.powerups & (1 << PW_INVULNERABLE)))
2999  {
3000  if (!(rand() % 3))
3001  {
3002  float alpha = 1.0f - ((float)(cg.time - cent->overheatTime) / 3000.0f);
3003 
3004  alpha *= 0.25f; // .25 max alpha
3005  CG_ParticleImpactSmokePuffExtended(cgs.media.smokeParticleShader, flash.origin, 1000, 8, 20, 30, alpha, 8.f);
3006  }
3007  }
3008  }
3009  else if (GetWeaponTableData(weaponNum)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_PANZER)
3010  {
3011  if (cg.time - cent->muzzleFlashTime < BARREL_SMOKE_TIME)
3012  {
3013  if (!(rand() % 5))
3014  {
3015  float alpha = 1.0f - ((float)(cg.time - cent->muzzleFlashTime) / (float)BARREL_SMOKE_TIME); // what fraction of BARREL_SMOKE_TIME are we at
3016 
3017  alpha *= 0.25f; // .25 max alpha
3018  CG_ParticleImpactSmokePuffExtended(cgs.media.smokeParticleShader, flash.origin, 1000, 8, 20, 30, alpha, 8.f);
3019  }
3020  }
3021  }
3022  }
3023 
3024  if (CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(weaponNum)->type, WEAPON_TYPE_MORTAR | WEAPON_TYPE_SET))
3025  {
3026  if (ps && !cg.renderingThirdPerson && cg.time - cent->muzzleFlashTime < 800)
3027  {
3028  CG_ParticleImpactSmokePuffExtended(cgs.media.smokeParticleShader, flash.origin, 700, 16, 20, 30, .12f, 4.f);
3029  }
3030  }
3031 
3032  // impulse flash
3033  if (cg.time - cent->muzzleFlashTime > MUZZLE_FLASH_TIME)
3034  {
3035  // blue ignition flame if not firing flamer
3036  if (weaponNum != WP_FLAMETHROWER)
3037  {
3038  return;
3039  }
3040  }
3041  }
3042 
3043  // weaps with barrel smoke
3044  if (ps || !isFirstPerson)
3045  {
3046  if (weaponNum == WP_STEN || weaponNum == WP_MP34)
3047  {
3048  if (cg.time - cent->muzzleFlashTime < 100)
3049  {
3050  CG_ParticleImpactSmokePuffExtended(cgs.media.smokeParticleShader, flash.origin, 500, 8, 20, 30, 0.25f, 8.f);
3051  }
3052  }
3053  }
3054 
3055  if (weaponNum != WP_FLAMETHROWER) // hide the flash also for now
3056  {
3057  // weapons that don't need to go any further as they have no flash or light
3058  if (!flash.hModel)
3059  {
3060  return;
3061  }
3062 
3063  // changed this so the muzzle flash stays onscreen for long enough to be seen
3064  if (cg.time - cent->muzzleFlashTime < MUZZLE_FLASH_TIME)
3065  {
3066  //if (firing) { // Ridah
3067  trap_R_AddRefEntityToScene(&flash);
3068  }
3069  }
3070 
3071  if (ps || !isFirstPerson)
3072  {
3073  int muzzleContents;
3074 
3075  // get contents to avoid lights in water etc - FIXME: this might be useful for other weapons too (move up?)
3076  muzzleContents = CG_PointContents(flash.origin, -1);
3077 
3078  if (muzzleContents & MASK_WATER)
3079  {
3080  return;
3081  }
3082 
3083  // no flamethrower flame on prone moving or dead players
3084  if ((cent->currentState.eFlags & EF_FIRING) && !(cent->currentState.eFlags & (EF_PRONE_MOVING | EF_DEAD)))
3085  {
3086  // Flamethrower effect
3087  CG_FlamethrowerFlame(cent, flash.origin);
3088 
3089  if (weapon->flashDlightColor[0] != 0.f || weapon->flashDlightColor[1] != 0.f || weapon->flashDlightColor[2] != 0.f)
3090  {
3091  trap_R_AddLightToScene(flash.origin, 320, 1.25 + (rand() & 31) / 128.0f, weapon->flashDlightColor[0],
3092  weapon->flashDlightColor[1], weapon->flashDlightColor[2], 0, 0);
3093  }
3094  }
3095  else
3096  {
3097  if (weaponNum == WP_FLAMETHROWER)
3098  {
3099  vec3_t angles;
3100  AxisToAngles(flash.axis, angles);
3101 
3102  if (ps)
3103  {
3104  if (ps->ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(weaponNum)->ammoIndex])
3105  {
3106  CG_FireFlameChunks(cent, flash.origin, angles, 1.0, qfalse);
3107  }
3108  }
3109  else
3110  {
3111  CG_FireFlameChunks(cent, flash.origin, angles, 1.0, qfalse);
3112  }
3113  }
3114  }
3115  }
3116 }
3117 
3122 void CG_AddViewWeapon(playerState_t *ps)
3123 {
3124  refEntity_t *hand = &cg.predictedPlayerEntity.pe.handRefEnt;
3125  float fovOffset;
3126  vec3_t angles;
3127  vec3_t gunoff;
3128  weaponInfo_t *weapon;
3129 
3130  if (ps->persistant[PERS_TEAM] == TEAM_SPECTATOR)
3131  {
3132  return;
3133  }
3134 
3135  if (ps->pm_type == PM_INTERMISSION)
3136  {
3137  return;
3138  }
3139 
3140  // no gun if in third person view
3141  if (cg.renderingThirdPerson)
3142  {
3143  return;
3144  }
3145 
3146  if (cg.editingSpeakers)
3147  {
3148  return;
3149  }
3150 
3151  // hide all gun models (0)
3152  // draw all gun models (1)
3153  // draw only melee weapon, syringe and pliers, and throwables (incl. grenades) (2)
3154  if (!cg_drawGun.integer || (cg_drawGun.integer == 2
3155  && GetWeaponTableData(ps->weapon)->type
3156  && !(GetWeaponTableData(ps->weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_GRENADE)
3157  && !(GetWeaponTableData(ps->weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_MELEE)
3158  && !(GetWeaponTableData(ps->weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SYRINGUE)))
3159  {
3160  if ((cg.predictedPlayerState.eFlags & EF_FIRING) && !BG_PlayerMounted(cg.predictedPlayerState.eFlags))
3161  {
3162  vec3_t origin;
3163 
3164  // special hack for flamethrower...
3165  VectorCopy(cg.refdef_current->vieworg, origin);
3166 
3167  VectorMA(origin, 18, cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[0], origin);
3168  VectorMA(origin, -7, cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[1], origin);
3169  VectorMA(origin, -4, cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[2], origin);
3170 
3171  // Flamethrower effect
3172  CG_FlamethrowerFlame(&cg.predictedPlayerEntity, origin);
3173  }
3174 
3175  if (cg.binocZoomTime)
3176  {
3177  if (cg.binocZoomTime < 0)
3178  {
3179  if (-cg.binocZoomTime + 700 < cg.time)
3180  {
3181  cg.binocZoomTime = 0;
3182  }
3183  }
3184  else
3185  {
3186  if (cg.binocZoomTime + 500 < cg.time)
3187  {
3188  trap_SendConsoleCommand("+zoom\n");
3189  cg.binocZoomTime = 0;
3190  }
3191  else
3192  {
3193  // TODO: ?
3194  }
3195  }
3196  }
3197 
3198  return;
3199  }
3200 
3201  // don't draw if testing a gun model
3202  if (cg.testGun)
3203  {
3204  return;
3205  }
3206 
3207  if ((ps->eFlags & EF_MG42_ACTIVE) || (ps->eFlags & EF_AAGUN_ACTIVE))
3208  {
3209  return;
3210  }
3211 
3212  // drop gun lower at higher fov
3213  if (cg_fov.value > 90)
3214  {
3215  fovOffset = -0.2f * (cg_fov.value - 90);
3216  }
3217  else
3218  {
3219  fovOffset = 0;
3220  }
3221 
3222  // mounted gun drawing
3223  if (ps->eFlags & EF_MOUNTEDTANK)
3224  {
3225  Com_Memset(hand, 0, sizeof(refEntity_t));
3226  CG_CalculateWeaponPosition(hand->origin, angles);
3227  AnglesToAxis(angles, hand->axis);
3228  hand->renderfx = RF_DEPTHHACK | RF_FIRST_PERSON | RF_MINLIGHT;
3229 
3230  if (IS_MOUNTED_TANK_BROWNING(ps->clientNum))
3231  {
3232  hand->hModel = cgs.media.hMountedFPBrowning;
3233  }
3234  else
3235  {
3236  hand->hModel = cgs.media.hMountedFPMG42;
3237  }
3238 
3239  //gunoff[0] = cg_gun_x.value;
3240  //gunoff[1] = cg_gun_y.value;
3241  //gunoff[2] = cg_gun_z.value;
3242 
3243  gunoff[0] = 20;
3244 
3245  if (cg.time - cg.predictedPlayerEntity.muzzleFlashTime < MUZZLE_FLASH_TIME)
3246  {
3247  gunoff[0] += random() * 2.f;
3248  }
3249 
3250  VectorMA(hand->origin, gunoff[0], cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[0], hand->origin);
3251  VectorMA(hand->origin, -10, cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[1], hand->origin);
3252  VectorMA(hand->origin, (-8 + fovOffset), cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[2], hand->origin);
3253 
3254  CG_AddWeaponWithPowerups(hand, cg.predictedPlayerEntity.currentState.powerups, ps, &cg.predictedPlayerEntity);
3255 
3256  if (cg.time - cg.predictedPlayerEntity.overheatTime < 3000)
3257  {
3258  if (!(rand() % 3))
3259  {
3260  float alpha = 1.0f - ((float)(cg.time - cg.predictedPlayerEntity.overheatTime) / 3000.0f);
3261 
3262  alpha *= 0.25f; // .25 max alpha
3263  CG_ParticleImpactSmokePuffExtended(cgs.media.smokeParticleShader, cg.tankflashorg, 1000, 8, 20, 30, alpha, 8.f);
3264  }
3265  }
3266 
3267  // FIXME: HACK dummy model to just draw _something_
3268  refEntity_t flash;
3269 
3270  Com_Memset(&flash, 0, sizeof(flash));
3271  flash.renderfx = (RF_LIGHTING_ORIGIN | RF_DEPTHHACK);
3272  flash.hModel = cgs.media.mg42muzzleflash;
3273 
3274  angles[YAW] = 0;
3275  angles[PITCH] = 0;
3276  angles[ROLL] = crandom() * 10;
3277  AnglesToAxis(angles, flash.axis);
3278 
3279  CG_PositionRotatedEntityOnTag(&flash, hand, "tag_flash");
3280 
3281  VectorMA(flash.origin, 22, flash.axis[0], flash.origin);
3282 
3283  VectorCopy(flash.origin, cg.tankflashorg);
3284 
3285  if (cg.time - cg.predictedPlayerEntity.muzzleFlashTime < MUZZLE_FLASH_TIME)
3286  {
3287  trap_R_AddRefEntityToScene(&flash);
3288  }
3289 
3290  return;
3291  }
3292 
3293  if (ps->weapon > WP_NONE)
3294  {
3295  weapon = &cg_weapons[ps->weapon];
3296 
3297  Com_Memset(hand, 0, sizeof(refEntity_t));
3298 
3299  // set up gun position
3300  CG_CalculateWeaponPosition(hand->origin, angles);
3301 
3302  gunoff[0] = cg_gun_x.value;
3303  gunoff[1] = cg_gun_y.value;
3304  gunoff[2] = cg_gun_z.value;
3305 
3306  VectorMA(hand->origin, gunoff[0], cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[0], hand->origin);
3307  VectorMA(hand->origin, gunoff[1], cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[1], hand->origin);
3308  VectorMA(hand->origin, (gunoff[2] + fovOffset), cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[2], hand->origin);
3309 
3310  AnglesToAxis(angles, hand->axis);
3311 
3312  if (cg_gun_frame.integer)
3313  {
3314  hand->frame = hand->oldframe = cg_gun_frame.integer;
3315  hand->backlerp = 0;
3316  }
3317  else // get the animation state
3318  {
3319  if (cg.binocZoomTime)
3320  {
3321  if (cg.binocZoomTime < 0)
3322  {
3323  if (-cg.binocZoomTime + 500 + 200 < cg.time)
3324  {
3325  cg.binocZoomTime = 0;
3326  }
3327  else
3328  {
3329  if (-cg.binocZoomTime + 200 < cg.time)
3330  {
3331  CG_ContinueWeaponAnim(WEAP_ALTSWITCHFROM);
3332  }
3333  else
3334  {
3335  CG_ContinueWeaponAnim(WEAP_IDLE2);
3336  }
3337  }
3338  }
3339  else
3340  {
3341  if (cg.binocZoomTime + 500 < cg.time)
3342  {
3343  trap_SendConsoleCommand("+zoom\n");
3344  cg.binocZoomTime = 0;
3345  CG_ContinueWeaponAnim(WEAP_IDLE2);
3346  }
3347  else
3348  {
3349  CG_ContinueWeaponAnim(WEAP_ALTSWITCHTO);
3350  }
3351  }
3352  }
3353 
3354  CG_WeaponAnimation(ps, weapon, &hand->oldframe, &hand->frame, &hand->backlerp);
3355  }
3356 
3357  hand->hModel = weapon->handsModel;
3358  hand->renderfx = RF_DEPTHHACK | RF_FIRST_PERSON | RF_MINLIGHT;
3359 
3360  // adjust bazooka so it has bigger distance to our crosshair
3361  if (ps->weapon == WP_BAZOOKA)
3362  {
3363  hand->axis[0][0] *= .8f;
3364  hand->axis[0][1] *= .8f;
3365  hand->axis[0][2] *= .8f;
3366  hand->nonNormalizedAxes = qtrue;
3367  }
3368 
3369  // add everything onto the hand
3370  CG_AddPlayerWeapon(hand, ps, &cg.predictedPlayerEntity);
3371  }
3372 }
3373 
3374 /*
3375 ==============================================================================
3376 WEAPON SELECTION
3377 ==============================================================================
3378 */
3379 
3385 static qboolean CG_WeaponHasAmmo(weapon_t weapon)
3386 {
3387  // certain weapons don't have ammo
3388  if ( (GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_MELEE) || weapon == WP_PLIERS)
3389  {
3390  return qtrue;
3391  }
3392 
3393  // check if the weapon still have ammo
3394  if (!(cg.predictedPlayerState.ammo[GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->ammoIndex]) &&
3395  !(cg.predictedPlayerState.ammoclip[GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->clipIndex]))
3396  {
3397  return qfalse;
3398  }
3399 
3400  return qtrue;
3401 }
3402 
3408 qboolean CG_WeaponSelectable(int weapon)
3409 {
3410  // allow the player to unselect all weapons
3411  //if(i == WP_NONE)
3412  // return qtrue;
3413 
3414  // if the player use a mounted weapon, don't allow weapon selection
3415  if (BG_PlayerMounted(cg.predictedPlayerState.eFlags))
3416  {
3417  return qfalse;
3418  }
3419 
3420  // check if the selected weapon is available
3421  if (!(COM_BitCheck(cg.predictedPlayerState.weapons, weapon)))
3422  {
3423  return qfalse;
3424  }
3425 
3426  if (!CG_WeaponHasAmmo((weapon_t)weapon))
3427  {
3428  return qfalse;
3429  }
3430 
3431  return qtrue;
3432 }
3433 
3441 int CG_WeaponIndex(int weapnum, int *bank, int *cycle)
3442 {
3443  static int bnk, cyc;
3444 
3445  if (weapnum <= 0 || weapnum >= WP_NUM_WEAPONS)
3446  {
3447  if (bank)
3448  {
3449  *bank = 0;
3450  }
3451 
3452  if (cycle)
3453  {
3454  *cycle = 0;
3455  }
3456  return 0;
3457  }
3458 
3459  for (bnk = 0; bnk < MAX_WEAP_BANKS_MP; bnk++)
3460  {
3461  for (cyc = 0; cyc < MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK_MP; cyc++)
3462  {
3463  if (!weapBanksMultiPlayer[bnk][cyc])
3464  {
3465  break;
3466  }
3467 
3468  // found the current weapon
3469  if (weapBanksMultiPlayer[bnk][cyc] == weapnum)
3470  {
3471  if (bank)
3472  {
3473  *bank = bnk;
3474  }
3475 
3476  if (cycle)
3477  {
3478  *cycle = cyc;
3479  }
3480  return 1;
3481  }
3482  }
3483  }
3484 
3485  // failed to find the weapon in the table
3486  // probably an alternate
3487 
3488  return 0;
3489 }
3490 
3498 static int getNextWeapInBank(int bank, int cycle)
3499 {
3500  cycle++;
3501 
3502  cycle = cycle % MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK_MP;
3503 
3504  if (weapBanksMultiPlayer[bank][cycle]) // return next weapon in bank if there is one
3505  {
3506  return weapBanksMultiPlayer[bank][cycle];
3507  }
3508 
3509  // return first in bank
3510  return weapBanksMultiPlayer[bank][0];
3511 }
3512 
3518 static int getNextWeapInBankBynum(int weapnum)
3519 {
3520  int bank, cycle;
3521 
3522  if (!CG_WeaponIndex(weapnum, &bank, &cycle))
3523  {
3524  return weapnum;
3525  }
3526 
3527  return getNextWeapInBank(bank, cycle);
3528 }
3529 
3538 static int getPrevWeapInBank(int bank, int cycle)
3539 {
3540  cycle--;
3541 
3542  if (cycle < 0)
3543  {
3544  cycle = MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK_MP - 1;
3545  }
3546 
3547  while (!weapBanksMultiPlayer[bank][cycle])
3548  {
3549  cycle--;
3550 
3551  if (cycle < 0)
3552  {
3553  cycle = MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK_MP - 1;
3554  }
3555  }
3556 
3557  return weapBanksMultiPlayer[bank][cycle];
3558 }
3559 
3565 static int getPrevWeapInBankBynum(int weapnum)
3566 {
3567  int bank, cycle;
3568 
3569  if (!CG_WeaponIndex(weapnum, &bank, &cycle))
3570  {
3571  return weapnum;
3572  }
3573 
3574  return getPrevWeapInBank(bank, cycle);
3575 }
3576 
3586 static int getNextBankWeap(int bank, int cycle, qboolean sameBankPosition)
3587 {
3588  bank++;
3589 
3590  bank = bank % MAX_WEAP_BANKS_MP;
3591 
3592  if (sameBankPosition && weapBanksMultiPlayer[bank][cycle])
3593  {
3594  return weapBanksMultiPlayer[bank][cycle];
3595  }
3596 
3597  return weapBanksMultiPlayer[bank][0];
3598 }
3599 
3609 static int getPrevBankWeap(int bank, int cycle, qboolean sameBankPosition)
3610 {
3611  bank--;
3612 
3613  if (bank < 0) // don't go below 0, cycle up to top
3614  {
3615  bank += MAX_WEAP_BANKS_MP;
3616  }
3617 
3618  bank = bank % MAX_WEAP_BANKS_MP;
3619 
3620  if (sameBankPosition && weapBanksMultiPlayer[bank][cycle])
3621  {
3622  return weapBanksMultiPlayer[bank][cycle];
3623  }
3624  else // find highest weap in bank
3625  {
3626  int i;
3627 
3628  for (i = MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK_MP - 1; i >= 0; i--)
3629  {
3630  if (weapBanksMultiPlayer[bank][i])
3631  {
3632  return weapBanksMultiPlayer[bank][i];
3633  }
3634  }
3635 
3636  // if it gets to here, no valid weaps in this bank, go down another bank
3637  return getPrevBankWeap(bank, cycle, sameBankPosition);
3638  }
3639 }
3640 
3646 void CG_FinishWeaponChange(int lastWeapon, int newWeapon)
3647 {
3648  int newbank;
3649 
3650  if (cg.binocZoomTime)
3651  {
3652  return;
3653  }
3654 
3655  cg.mortarImpactTime = -2;
3656 
3657  if (lastWeapon != GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->weapAlts)
3658  {
3659  if (((GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_PISTOL) && !(GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_SILENCED) && (cg.pmext.silencedSideArm & 1))
3660  || ((GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_PISTOL) && (GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_SILENCED) && !(cg.pmext.silencedSideArm & 1))
3661  || ((GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLE) && (cg.pmext.silencedSideArm & 2))
3662  || ((GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLENADE) && !(cg.pmext.silencedSideArm & 2)))
3663  {
3664  newWeapon = GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->weapAlts;
3665  cg.weaponSelect = newWeapon;
3666  }
3667  }
3668 
3669  if (lastWeapon == WP_BINOCULARS && (cg.snap->ps.eFlags & EF_ZOOMING))
3670  {
3671  trap_SendConsoleCommand("-zoom\n");
3672  }
3673 
3674  cg.weaponSelectTime = cg.time; // flash the weapon icon
3675 
3676  if (cg.newCrosshairIndex)
3677  {
3678  trap_Cvar_Set("cg_drawCrossHair", va("%d", cg.newCrosshairIndex - 1));
3679  }
3680 
3681  cg.newCrosshairIndex = 0;
3682 
3683  // remember which weapon in this bank was last selected so when cycling back
3684  // to this bank, that weap will be highlighted first
3685  if (CG_WeaponIndex(newWeapon, &newbank, NULL))
3686  {
3687  cg.lastWeapSelInBank[newbank] = newWeapon;
3688  }
3689 
3690  if (lastWeapon == newWeapon) // no need to do any more than flash the icon
3691  {
3692  return;
3693  }
3694 
3695  // setup for a user call to CG_LastWeaponUsed_f()
3696  if (lastWeapon == cg.lastFiredWeapon)
3697  {
3698  // don't set switchback for some weaps...
3699  if (!(GetWeaponTableData(lastWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPED))
3700  {
3701  cg.switchbackWeapon = lastWeapon;
3702  }
3703  else
3704  {
3705  cg.switchbackWeapon = GetWeaponTableData(lastWeapon)->weapAlts;
3706  }
3707  }
3708  else
3709  {
3710  // if this ended up having the switchback be the same
3711  // as the new weapon, set the switchback to the prev
3712  // selected weapon will become the switchback
3713  if (cg.switchbackWeapon == newWeapon)
3714  {
3715  if (!(GetWeaponTableData(lastWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPED))
3716  {
3717  cg.switchbackWeapon = lastWeapon;
3718  }
3719  else
3720  {
3721  cg.switchbackWeapon = GetWeaponTableData(lastWeapon)->weapAlts;
3722  }
3723  }
3724  // this fixes cg.switchbackWeapon=0 after very first spawn and switching weapon for the first time
3725  else if (cg.switchbackWeapon == WP_NONE && CG_WeaponSelectable(lastWeapon)) // ensure last weapon is available
3726  {
3727  if (!(GetWeaponTableData(lastWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPED))
3728  {
3729  cg.switchbackWeapon = lastWeapon;
3730  }
3731  else
3732  {
3733  cg.switchbackWeapon = GetWeaponTableData(lastWeapon)->weapAlts;
3734  }
3735  }
3736  }
3737 
3738  cg.weaponSelect = newWeapon;
3739 }
3740 
3741 extern pmove_t cg_pmove;
3742 
3746 void CG_AltWeapon_f(void)
3747 {
3748  if (!cg.snap)
3749  {
3750  return;
3751  }
3752 
3753  // overload for spec mode when following
3754  if (((cg.snap->ps.pm_flags & PMF_FOLLOW) || cg.snap->ps.persistant[PERS_TEAM] == TEAM_SPECTATOR)
3755 #ifdef FEATURE_MULTIVIEW
3756  || cg.mvTotalClients > 0
3757 #endif
3758  )
3759  {
3760  trap_SendConsoleCommand("followprev");
3761  return;
3762  }
3763 
3764  if (cg.snap->ps.pm_flags & PMF_RESPAWNED)
3765  {
3766  return;
3767  }
3768 
3769  if (BG_PlayerMounted(cg.snap->ps.eFlags))
3770  {
3771  return;
3772  }
3773 
3774  if (cg.snap->ps.pm_type == PM_FREEZE)
3775  {
3776  return;
3777  }
3778 
3779  if (cg.snap->ps.pm_type == PM_DEAD)
3780  {
3781  return;
3782  }
3783 
3784  // don't allow switch when zooming with binocular not equipped,
3785  // due to the binocular mask which doesn't disappear when switching
3786  if (cg.zoomedBinoc && cg.weaponSelect != WP_BINOCULARS)
3787  {
3788  return;
3789  }
3790 
3791  if (cg.weaponSelect == WP_BINOCULARS)
3792  {
3793  /*if(cg.snap->ps.eFlags & EF_ZOOMING) {
3794  trap_SendConsoleCommand( "-zoom\n" );
3795  } else {
3796  trap_SendConsoleCommand( "+zoom\n" );
3797  }*/
3798 
3799  // don't allow zooming when prone moving (prevent fast zoom/unzoom)
3800  if (cg.predictedPlayerState.eFlags & EF_PRONE_MOVING)
3801  {
3802  return;
3803  }
3804 
3805  if (cg.snap->ps.eFlags & EF_ZOOMING)
3806  {
3807  trap_SendConsoleCommand("-zoom\n");
3808  cg.binocZoomTime = -cg.time;
3809  }
3810  else
3811  {
3812  if (!cg.binocZoomTime)
3813  {
3814  cg.binocZoomTime = cg.time;
3815  }
3816  }
3817 
3818  return;
3819  }
3820 
3821  // don't check for weapon with alternative weapon, instead check special action
3822  if (!GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->weapAlts)
3823  {
3824  if (cg_weapaltReloads.integer && GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->useClip)
3825  {
3826  //TODO: This is a horrible way of doing it but theres not other way atm.
3827  trap_SendConsoleCommand("+reload\n");
3828  trap_SendConsoleCommand("-reload\n");
3829  }
3830  // some alt vsays,
3831  // 0 - disabled
3832  // 1 - team
3833  // 2 - fireteam
3834  else if (cg_quickchat.integer)
3835  {
3836  char *cmd;
3837 
3838  if (cg_quickchat.integer == 2)
3839  {
3840  cmd = va("vsay_buddy -1 %s", CG_BuildSelectedFirteamString());
3841  }
3842  else
3843  {
3844  cmd = "vsay_team";
3845  }
3846 
3847  switch (cg.weaponSelect)
3848  {
3849  case WP_DYNAMITE:
3850  trap_SendConsoleCommand(va("cmd %s %s\n", cmd, "FTExploreArea"));
3851  break; //return;
3852  case WP_SMOKE_BOMB:
3853  switch ((rand() % 2))
3854  {
3855  case 0:
3856  trap_SendConsoleCommand(va("cmd %s %s\n", cmd, "FTGoUndercover"));
3857  break;
3858  case 1:
3859  trap_SendConsoleCommand(va("cmd %s %s\n", cmd, "FTInfiltrate"));
3860  break;
3861  }
3862  break; //return;
3863  case WP_SMOKE_MARKER:
3864  case WP_GRENADE_LAUNCHER:
3865  case WP_GRENADE_PINEAPPLE:
3866  trap_SendConsoleCommand(va("cmd %s %s\n", cmd, "FireInTheHole"));
3867  break; //return;
3868  case WP_PLIERS:
3869  switch ((rand() % 3))
3870  {
3871  case 0:
3872  trap_SendConsoleCommand(va("cmd %s %s\n", cmd, "CoverMe"));
3873  break;
3874  case 1:
3875  trap_SendConsoleCommand(va("cmd %s %s\n", cmd, "NeedBackup"));
3876  break;
3877  case 2:
3878  trap_SendConsoleCommand(va("cmd %s %s\n", cmd, "ClearPath"));
3879  break;
3880  }
3881  break; //return;
3882  case WP_SATCHEL:
3883  trap_SendConsoleCommand(va("cmd %s %s\n", cmd, "LetsGo"));
3884  break; //return;
3885  case WP_MEDKIT:
3886  case WP_MEDIC_SYRINGE:
3887  trap_SendConsoleCommand(va("cmd %s %s\n", cmd, "IamMedic"));
3888  break; //return;
3889  case WP_AMMO:
3890  trap_SendConsoleCommand(va("cmd %s %s\n", cmd, "IamFieldOps"));
3891  break; // return;
3892  // add others ...
3893  //case WP_POISON_SYRINGE:
3894  //trap_SendConsoleCommand(va("cmd %s %s\n", cmd, "EnemyWeak"));
3895  //return;
3896  default:
3897  break;
3898  }
3899  }
3900 
3901  return;
3902  }
3903 
3904  // force pause so holding it down won't go too fast
3905  if (cg.time - cg.weaponSelectTime < cg_weaponCycleDelay.integer)
3906  {
3907  return;
3908  }
3909 
3910  // don't allow another reloading when we're still swapping to prevent animation breaking
3911  if (cg.snap->ps.weaponstate == WEAPON_RELOADING)
3912  {
3913  return;
3914  }
3915 
3916  // don't allow another weapon switch when we're still swapping alt weap, to prevent animation breaking
3917  // there we check the value of the animation to prevent any switch during raising and dropping alt weapon
3918  // until the animation is ended
3919  if ((cg.snap->ps.weapAnim & ~ANIM_TOGGLEBIT) == WEAP_ALTSWITCHFROM ||
3920  (cg.snap->ps.weapAnim & ~ANIM_TOGGLEBIT) == WEAP_ALTSWITCHTO)
3921  {
3922  return;
3923  }
3924 
3925  // need ground for this
3926  if (GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SETTABLE)
3927  {
3928  if (GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_MG)
3929  {
3930  if (!(cg.predictedPlayerState.eFlags & EF_PRONE))
3931  {
3932  return;
3933  }
3934  }
3935  else // mortar
3936  {
3937  int contents;
3938  vec3_t point;
3939 
3940  if (cg.predictedPlayerState.groundEntityNum == ENTITYNUM_NONE)
3941  {
3942  return;
3943  }
3944 
3945  if (!cg.predictedPlayerState.ammoclip[cg.weaponSelect])
3946  {
3947  return;
3948  }
3949 
3950  if (cg.predictedPlayerState.eFlags & EF_PRONE)
3951  {
3952  return;
3953  }
3954 
3955  if (cg_pmove.waterlevel == 3)
3956  {
3957  return;
3958  }
3959 
3960  // don't allow set if moving
3961  if (VectorLengthSquared(cg.snap->ps.velocity) != 0.f)
3962  {
3963  return;
3964  }
3965 
3966  // eurgh, need it here too else we play sounds :/
3967  point[0] = cg.snap->ps.origin[0];
3968  point[1] = cg.snap->ps.origin[1];
3969  point[2] = cg.snap->ps.origin[2] + cg.snap->ps.crouchViewHeight;
3970  contents = CG_PointContents(point, cg.snap->ps.clientNum);
3971 
3972  if (contents & MASK_WATER)
3973  {
3974  return;
3975  }
3976  }
3977  }
3978  else if (GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPABLE)
3979  {
3980  // don't allow players switching to scoped weapon when prone moving
3981  if (cg.predictedPlayerState.eFlags & EF_PRONE_MOVING)
3982  {
3983  return;
3984  }
3985  }
3986 
3987  if ((!(GetWeaponTableData(GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->weapAlts)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLENADE) // allow alt switch (but for riflenade) even if out-of-ammo
3988  && (COM_BitCheck(cg.predictedPlayerState.weapons, GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->weapAlts))) // and ensure the alt weapon is there
3989  || CG_WeaponSelectable(GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->weapAlts)) // or check if new weapon is valid (riflenade need ammo for switching to)
3990  {
3991  CG_FinishWeaponChange(cg.weaponSelect, GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->weapAlts);
3992  }
3993  else if (cg_weapaltReloads.integer)
3994  {
3995  //TODO: This is a horrible way of doing it but theres not other way atm.
3996  trap_SendConsoleCommand("+reload\n");
3997  trap_SendConsoleCommand("-reload\n");
3998  }
3999 }
4000 
4005 void CG_NextWeap(qboolean switchBanks)
4006 {
4007  int bank = 0, cycle = 0, newbank = 0, newcycle = 0;
4008  int num = cg.weaponSelect;
4009  int curweap = cg.weaponSelect;
4010  qboolean nextbank = qfalse; // need to switch to the next bank of weapons?
4011  int i;
4012 
4013  if (GetWeaponTableData(curweap)->type & (WEAPON_TYPE_PISTOL | WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLE))
4014  {
4015  num = GetWeaponTableData(curweap)->weapAlts;
4016  }
4017 
4018  CG_WeaponIndex(curweap, &bank, &cycle); // get bank/cycle of current weapon
4019 
4020  if (cg_cycleAllWeaps.integer || !switchBanks)
4021  {
4022  for (i = 0; i < MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK_MP; i++)
4023  {
4024  num = getNextWeapInBankBynum(num);
4025 
4026  CG_WeaponIndex(num, NULL, &newcycle); // get cycle of new weapon. if it's lower than the original, then it cycled around
4027 
4028  if (switchBanks)
4029  {
4030  if (newcycle <= cycle)
4031  {
4032  nextbank = qtrue;
4033  break;
4034  }
4035  }
4036  else // don't switch banks if you get to the end
4037  {
4038  if (num == curweap) // back to start, just leave it where it is
4039  {
4040  return;
4041  }
4042  }
4043 
4044  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(num))
4045  {
4046  break;
4047  }
4048 
4049  if (GetWeaponTableData(num)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLE)
4050  {
4051  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(GetWeaponTableData(num)->weapAlts))
4052  {
4053  num = GetWeaponTableData(num)->weapAlts;
4054  break;
4055  }
4056  }
4057  }
4058  }
4059  else
4060  {
4061  nextbank = qtrue;
4062  }
4063 
4064  if (nextbank)
4065  {
4066  int j;
4067 
4068  for (i = 0; i < MAX_WEAP_BANKS_MP; i++)
4069  {
4070  if (cg_cycleAllWeaps.integer)
4071  {
4072  num = getNextBankWeap(bank + i, cycle, qfalse); // cycling all weaps always starts the next bank at the bottom
4073  }
4074  else
4075  {
4076  if (cg.lastWeapSelInBank[bank + i + 1])
4077  {
4078  num = cg.lastWeapSelInBank[bank + i + 1];
4079  }
4080  else
4081  {
4082  num = getNextBankWeap(bank + i, cycle, qtrue);
4083  }
4084  }
4085 
4086  if (num == 0)
4087  {
4088  continue;
4089  }
4090 
4091  //if(num == WP_BINOCULARS) {
4092  // continue;
4093  //}
4094 
4095  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(num)) // first entry in bank was selectable, no need to scan the bank
4096  {
4097  break;
4098  }
4099 
4100  if (GetWeaponTableData(num)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLE)
4101  {
4102  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(GetWeaponTableData(num)->weapAlts))
4103  {
4104  num = GetWeaponTableData(num)->weapAlts;
4105  break;
4106  }
4107  }
4108 
4109  CG_WeaponIndex(num, &newbank, &newcycle); // get the bank of the new weap
4110 
4111  for (j = newcycle; j < MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK_MP; j++)
4112  {
4113  num = getNextWeapInBank(newbank, j);
4114 
4115  //if(num == WP_BINOCULARS) {
4116  // continue;
4117  //}
4118 
4119  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(num)) // found selectable weapon
4120  {
4121  break;
4122  }
4123 
4124  if (GetWeaponTableData(num)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLE)
4125  {
4126  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(GetWeaponTableData(num)->weapAlts))
4127  {
4128  num = GetWeaponTableData(num)->weapAlts;
4129  break;
4130  }
4131  }
4132 
4133  num = 0;
4134  }
4135 
4136  if (num) // a selectable weapon was found in the current bank
4137  {
4138  break;
4139  }
4140  }
4141  }
4142 
4143  CG_FinishWeaponChange(curweap, num);
4144 }
4145 
4152 void CG_PrevWeap(qboolean switchBanks)
4153 {
4154  int bank = 0, cycle = 0, newbank = 0, newcycle = 0;
4155  int num = cg.weaponSelect;
4156  int curweap = cg.weaponSelect;
4157  qboolean prevbank = qfalse; // need to switch to the next bank of weapons?
4158  int i;
4159 
4160  if (((GetWeaponTableData(curweap)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_PISTOL) && (GetWeaponTableData(curweap)->attributes & WEAPON_ATTRIBUT_SILENCED))
4161  || GetWeaponTableData(curweap)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLENADE)
4162  {
4163  num = GetWeaponTableData(curweap)->weapAlts;
4164  }
4165 
4166  CG_WeaponIndex(curweap, &bank, &cycle); // get bank/cycle of current weapon
4167 
4168  // initially, just try to find a lower weapon in the current bank
4169  if (cg_cycleAllWeaps.integer || !switchBanks)
4170  {
4171  for (i = MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK_MP; i >= 0; i--)
4172  {
4173  num = getPrevWeapInBankBynum(num);
4174 
4175  CG_WeaponIndex(num, NULL, &newcycle); // get cycle of new weapon. if it's greater than the original, then it cycled around
4176 
4177  if (switchBanks)
4178  {
4179  if (newcycle > (cycle - 1))
4180  {
4181  prevbank = qtrue;
4182  break;
4183  }
4184  }
4185  else // don't switch banks if you get to the end
4186  {
4187  if (num == curweap) // back to start, just leave it where it is
4188  {
4189  return;
4190  }
4191  }
4192 
4193  //if(num == WP_BINOCULARS) {
4194  // continue;
4195  //}
4196 
4197  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(num))
4198  {
4199  break;
4200  }
4201 
4202  if (GetWeaponTableData(num)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLE)
4203  {
4204  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(GetWeaponTableData(num)->weapAlts))
4205  {
4206  num = GetWeaponTableData(num)->weapAlts;
4207  break;
4208  }
4209  }
4210  }
4211  }
4212  else
4213  {
4214  prevbank = qtrue;
4215  }
4216 
4217  // cycle to previous bank.
4218  // if cycleAllWeaps: find highest weapon in bank
4219  // else: try to find weap in bank that matches cycle position
4220  // else: use base weap in bank
4221 
4222  if (prevbank)
4223  {
4224  int j;
4225 
4226  for (i = 0; i < MAX_WEAP_BANKS_MP; i++)
4227  {
4228  if (cg_cycleAllWeaps.integer)
4229  {
4230  num = getPrevBankWeap(bank - i, cycle, qfalse); // cycling all weaps always starts the next bank at the bottom
4231  }
4232  else
4233  {
4234  num = getPrevBankWeap(bank - i, cycle, qtrue);
4235  }
4236 
4237  if (num == 0)
4238  {
4239  continue;
4240  }
4241 
4242  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(num)) // first entry in bank was selectable, no need to scan the bank
4243  {
4244  break;
4245  }
4246 
4247  if (GetWeaponTableData(num)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLE)
4248  {
4249  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(GetWeaponTableData(num)->weapAlts))
4250  {
4251  num = GetWeaponTableData(num)->weapAlts;
4252  break;
4253  }
4254  }
4255 
4256  CG_WeaponIndex(num, &newbank, &newcycle); // get the bank of the new weap
4257 
4258  for (j = MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK_MP; j > 0; j--)
4259  {
4260  num = getPrevWeapInBank(newbank, j);
4261 
4262  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(num)) // found selectable weapon
4263  {
4264  break;
4265  }
4266 
4267  if (GetWeaponTableData(num)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLE)
4268  {
4269  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(GetWeaponTableData(num)->weapAlts))
4270  {
4271  num = GetWeaponTableData(num)->weapAlts;
4272  break;
4273  }
4274  }
4275 
4276  num = 0;
4277  }
4278 
4279  if (num) // a selectable weapon was found in the current bank
4280  {
4281  break;
4282  }
4283  }
4284  }
4285 
4286  CG_FinishWeaponChange(curweap, num);
4287 }
4288 
4293 qboolean CG_CheckCanSwitch(void)
4294 {
4295  if (!cg.snap)
4296  {
4297  return qfalse;
4298  }
4299 
4300  if (cg.snap->ps.pm_flags & PMF_RESPAWNED)
4301  {
4302  return qfalse;
4303  }
4304 
4305  // pause bug
4306  if (cg.snap->ps.pm_type == PM_FREEZE)
4307  {
4308  return qfalse;
4309  }
4310 
4311  if (cg.snap->ps.pm_type == PM_DEAD)
4312  {
4313  return qfalse;
4314  }
4315 
4316  if ((cg.snap->ps.pm_flags & PMF_FOLLOW) || cg.snap->ps.persistant[PERS_TEAM] == TEAM_SPECTATOR)
4317  {
4318  return qfalse;
4319  }
4320 
4321  // don't allow switch when zooming with binocular not equipped,
4322  // due to the binocular mask which doesn't disappear when switching
4323  if (cg.zoomedBinoc && cg.weaponSelect != WP_BINOCULARS)
4324  {
4325  return qfalse;
4326  }
4327 
4328  if (BG_PlayerMounted(cg.snap->ps.eFlags))
4329  {
4330  return qfalse;
4331  }
4332 
4333  // force pause so holding it down won't go too fast
4334  if (cg.time - cg.weaponSelectTime < cg_weaponCycleDelay.integer)
4335  {
4336  return qfalse;
4337  }
4338 
4339  if (GetWeaponTableData(cg.snap->ps.weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SET)
4340  {
4341  return qfalse;
4342  }
4343 
4344  // don't try to switch when in the middle of reloading
4345  // cheatinfo: The server actually would let you switch if this check were not
4346  // present, but would discard the reload. So the when you switched
4347  // back you'd have to start the reload over. This seems bad, however
4348  // the delay for the current reload is already in effect, so you'd lose
4349  // the reload time twice. (the first pause for the current weapon reload,
4350  // and the pause when you have to reload again 'cause you canceled this one)
4351  if (cg.snap->ps.weaponstate == WEAPON_RELOADING)
4352  {
4353  return qfalse;
4354  }
4355 
4356  return qtrue;
4357 }
4358 
4364 qboolean CG_ZoomRequired(qboolean isNextWeap)
4365 {
4366  // this cvar is an option that lets the player use his weapon switching keys (probably the mousewheel)
4367  // for zooming (binocs/snooper/sniper/etc.)
4368  if (cg.zoomval != 0.f)
4369  {
4370  if (cg_useWeapsForZoom.integer == (isNextWeap ? 1 : 2))
4371  {
4372  CG_ZoomIn_f();
4373  return qtrue;
4374  }
4375 
4376  if (cg_useWeapsForZoom.integer == (isNextWeap ? 2 : 1))
4377  {
4378  CG_ZoomOut_f();
4379  return qtrue;
4380  }
4381  }
4382 
4383  return qfalse;
4384 }
4385 
4389 void CG_LastWeaponUsed_f(void)
4390 {
4391  if (!CG_CheckCanSwitch())
4392  {
4393  return;
4394  }
4395 
4396  if (!cg.switchbackWeapon)
4397  {
4398  cg.switchbackWeapon = cg.weaponSelect;
4399  return;
4400  }
4401 
4402  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(cg.switchbackWeapon))
4403  {
4404  CG_FinishWeaponChange(cg.weaponSelect, cg.switchbackWeapon);
4405  }
4406  else // switchback no longer selectable, reset cycle
4407  {
4408  cg.switchbackWeapon = WP_NONE;
4409  }
4410 }
4411 
4415 void CG_NextWeaponInBank_f(void)
4416 {
4417  if (CG_ZoomRequired(qtrue))
4418  {
4419  return;
4420  }
4421 
4422  if (!CG_CheckCanSwitch())
4423  {
4424  return;
4425  }
4426 
4427  CG_NextWeap(qfalse);
4428 }
4429 
4433 void CG_PrevWeaponInBank_f(void)
4434 {
4435  if (CG_ZoomRequired(qfalse))
4436  {
4437  return;
4438  }
4439 
4440  if (!CG_CheckCanSwitch())
4441  {
4442  return;
4443  }
4444 
4445  CG_PrevWeap(qfalse);
4446 }
4447 
4451 void CG_NextWeapon_f(void)
4452 {
4453  if (!cg.snap)
4454  {
4455  return;
4456  }
4457 
4458 #ifdef FEATURE_MULTIVIEW
4459  // overload for MV clients
4460  if (cg.mvTotalClients > 0)
4461  {
4462  CG_mvToggleView_f();
4463  return;
4464  }
4465 #endif
4466 
4467  if (CG_ZoomRequired(qtrue))
4468  {
4469  return;
4470  }
4471 
4472  if (!CG_CheckCanSwitch())
4473  {
4474  return;
4475  }
4476 
4477  CG_NextWeap(qtrue);
4478 }
4479 
4483 void CG_PrevWeapon_f(void)
4484 {
4485  if (!cg.snap)
4486  {
4487  return;
4488  }
4489 
4490 #ifdef FEATURE_MULTIVIEW
4491  // overload for MV clients
4492  if (cg.mvTotalClients > 0)
4493  {
4494  CG_mvSwapViews_f();
4495  return;
4496  }
4497 #endif
4498 
4499  if (CG_ZoomRequired(qfalse))
4500  {
4501  return;
4502  }
4503 
4504  if (!CG_CheckCanSwitch())
4505  {
4506  return;
4507  }
4508 
4509  CG_PrevWeap(qtrue);
4510 }
4511 
4516 void CG_WeaponBank_f(void)
4517 {
4518  int newWeapon, i;
4519  int curbank = 0, curcycle = 0, bank = 0, cycle = 0;
4520 
4521  if (!CG_CheckCanSwitch())
4522  {
4523  return;
4524  }
4525 
4526  bank = atoi(CG_Argv(1));
4527 
4528  if (bank <= 0 || bank >= MAX_WEAP_BANKS_MP)
4529  {
4530  return;
4531  }
4532 
4533  CG_WeaponIndex(cg.weaponSelect, &curbank, &curcycle); // get bank/cycle of current weapon
4534 
4535  if (!cg.lastWeapSelInBank[bank])
4536  {
4537  newWeapon = weapBanksMultiPlayer[bank][0];
4538  cycle -= 1; // cycle up to first weap
4539  }
4540  else
4541  {
4542  newWeapon = cg.lastWeapSelInBank[bank];
4543  CG_WeaponIndex(newWeapon, &bank, &cycle);
4544 
4545  if (bank != curbank)
4546  {
4547  cycle -= 1;
4548  }
4549  }
4550 
4551  for (i = 0; i < MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK_MP; i++)
4552  {
4553  newWeapon = getNextWeapInBank(bank, cycle + i);
4554 
4555  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(newWeapon))
4556  {
4557  break;
4558  }
4559 
4560  if (GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLE)
4561  {
4562  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->weapAlts))
4563  {
4564  newWeapon = GetWeaponTableData(newWeapon)->weapAlts;
4565  break;
4566  }
4567  }
4568  }
4569 
4570  if (i == MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK_MP)
4571  {
4572  return;
4573  }
4574 
4575  CG_FinishWeaponChange(cg.weaponSelect, newWeapon);
4576 }
4577 
4581 void CG_Weapon_f(void)
4582 {
4583  int num;
4584 
4585  num = atoi(CG_Argv(1));
4586 
4587  // weapon bind should execute weaponbank instead -- for splitting out class weapons, per Id request
4588  if (num < MAX_WEAP_BANKS_MP)
4589  {
4590  CG_WeaponBank_f();
4591  }
4592 }
4593 
4594 int weapBankSwitchOrder[MAX_WEAP_BANK_SWITCH_ORDER] = { 3, 2, 4, 1 }; // rifle, pistol, grenade, knife
4595 
4600 void CG_OutOfAmmoChange(qboolean allowForceSwitch)
4601 {
4602  int i, j;
4603  // int bank = 0, cycle = 0;
4604 
4605  // trivial switching
4606  if (cg.weaponSelect == WP_PLIERS || (cg.weaponSelect == WP_SATCHEL_DET && cg.predictedPlayerState.ammoclip[WP_SATCHEL_DET]))
4607  {
4608  return;
4609  }
4610 
4611  if (allowForceSwitch)
4612  {
4613  if ((cg.weaponSelect == WP_LANDMINE || cg.weaponSelect == WP_DYNAMITE) && CG_WeaponSelectable(WP_PLIERS))
4614  {
4615  CG_FinishWeaponChange(cg.predictedPlayerState.weapon, WP_PLIERS);
4616  return;
4617  }
4618 
4619  if (cg.weaponSelect == WP_SATCHEL && CG_WeaponSelectable(WP_SATCHEL_DET))
4620  {
4621  CG_FinishWeaponChange(cg.predictedPlayerState.weapon, WP_SATCHEL_DET);
4622  return;
4623  }
4624 
4625  if (GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->type & (WEAPON_TYPE_SET | WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLENADE))
4626  {
4627  CG_FinishWeaponChange(cg.predictedPlayerState.weapon, GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->weapAlts);
4628  return;
4629  }
4630 
4631  if ((GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_PANZER) || cg.weaponSelect == WP_SMOKE_BOMB || cg.weaponSelect == WP_MEDIC_ADRENALINE)
4632  {
4633  for (i = 0; i < MAX_WEAP_BANK_SWITCH_ORDER; i++)
4634  {
4635  for (j = 0; j < MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK_MP && weapBanksMultiPlayer[weapBankSwitchOrder[i]][j]; j++)
4636  {
4637  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(weapBanksMultiPlayer[weapBankSwitchOrder[i]][j]))
4638  {
4639  // make sure we don't reselect the panzer or bazooka
4640  if ((GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_PANZER) && (GetWeaponTableData(weapBanksMultiPlayer[weapBankSwitchOrder[i]][j])->type & WEAPON_TYPE_PANZER))
4641  {
4642  continue;
4643  }
4644 
4645  CG_FinishWeaponChange(cg.predictedPlayerState.weapon, weapBanksMultiPlayer[weapBankSwitchOrder[i]][j]);
4646  return;
4647  }
4648  }
4649  }
4650  }
4651 
4652  // now try the opposite team's equivalent weap
4653  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->weapEquiv))
4654  {
4655  CG_FinishWeaponChange(cg.predictedPlayerState.weapon, GetWeaponTableData(cg.weaponSelect)->weapEquiv);
4656  return;
4657  }
4658  }
4659 
4660  // more useful weapon changes -- check if rifle or pistol is still working, and use that if available
4661  for (i = 0; i < MAX_WEAP_BANK_SWITCH_ORDER; i++)
4662  {
4663  for (j = 0; j < MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK_MP && weapBanksMultiPlayer[weapBankSwitchOrder[i]][j]; j++)
4664  {
4665  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(weapBanksMultiPlayer[weapBankSwitchOrder[i]][j]))
4666  {
4667  CG_FinishWeaponChange(cg.predictedPlayerState.weapon, weapBanksMultiPlayer[weapBankSwitchOrder[i]][j]);
4668  return;
4669  }
4670  }
4671  }
4672 
4673  // NOTE: never reached, as knife is always found
4674  /*
4675  // didn't have available alternative or equivalent, try another weap in the bank
4676  CG_WeaponIndex(cg.weaponSelect, &bank, &cycle); // get bank/cycle of current weapon
4677 
4678  // otherwise just do something
4679  for (i = cycle; i < MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK_MP; i++)
4680  {
4681  equiv = getNextWeapInBank(bank, i);
4682  if (CG_WeaponSelectable(equiv)) // found a reasonable replacement
4683  {
4684  cg.weaponSelect = equiv;
4685  CG_FinishWeaponChange(cg.predictedPlayerState.weapon, cg.weaponSelect);
4686  return;
4687  }
4688  }
4689  // still nothing available, just go to the next
4690  // available weap using the regular selection scheme
4691  CG_NextWeap(qtrue);
4692  */
4693 }
4694 
4695 
4696 /*
4697 ===================================================================================================
4698 WEAPON EVENTS
4699 ===================================================================================================
4700 */
4701 
4706 void CG_MG42EFX(centity_t *cent)
4707 {
4708  // complete overhaul of this one
4709  centity_t *mg42;
4710  int num;
4711  vec3_t forward, point;
4712  refEntity_t flash;
4713 
4714  // find the mg42 we're attached to
4715  for (num = 0 ; num < cg.snap->numEntities ; num++)
4716  {
4717  mg42 = &cg_entities[cg.snap->entities[num].number];
4718 
4719  if (mg42->currentState.eType == ET_MG42_BARREL &&
4720  mg42->currentState.otherEntityNum == cent->currentState.number)
4721  {
4722  // found it, clamp behind gun
4723  VectorCopy(mg42->currentState.pos.trBase, point);
4724  //AngleVectors (mg42->s.apos.trBase, forward, NULL, NULL);
4725  AngleVectors(cent->lerpAngles, forward, NULL, NULL);
4726  VectorMA(point, 40, forward, point);
4727 
4728  Com_Memset(&flash, 0, sizeof(flash));
4729  flash.renderfx = RF_LIGHTING_ORIGIN;
4730  flash.hModel = cgs.media.mg42muzzleflash;
4731 
4732  VectorCopy(point, flash.origin);
4733  AnglesToAxis(cent->lerpAngles, flash.axis);
4734 
4735  trap_R_AddRefEntityToScene(&flash);
4736 
4737  // add dynamic light
4738  trap_R_AddLightToScene(flash.origin, 320, 1.25f + (rand() & 31) / 128.0f, 1.0f, 0.6f, 0.23f, 0, 0);
4739  return;
4740  }
4741  }
4742 }
4743 
4748 void CG_MortarEFX(centity_t *cent)
4749 {
4750  if (cent->currentState.density & 1) // map mortar spawn flag
4751  {
4752  // smoke
4753  CG_ParticleImpactSmokePuff(cgs.media.smokePuffShader, cent->currentState.origin);
4754  }
4755 
4756  if (cent->currentState.density & 2) // map mortar spawn flag
4757  {
4758  refEntity_t flash;
4759 
4760  // muzzle flash
4761  Com_Memset(&flash, 0, sizeof(flash));
4762  flash.renderfx = RF_LIGHTING_ORIGIN;
4763  flash.hModel = cgs.media.mg42muzzleflash;
4764 
4765  VectorCopy(cent->currentState.origin, flash.origin);
4766  AnglesToAxis(cg.refdefViewAngles, flash.axis);
4767 
4768  trap_R_AddRefEntityToScene(&flash);
4769 
4770  // add dynamic light
4771  trap_R_AddLightToScene(flash.origin, 320, 1.25f + (rand() & 31) / 128.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 0, 0);
4772  }
4773 }
4774 
4779 void CG_WeaponFireRecoil(int weapon)
4780 {
4781  float pitchAdd = cg_weapons[weapon].fireRecoil[PITCH];
4782  float yawRandom = cg_weapons[weapon].fireRecoil[YAW];
4783  vec3_t recoil;
4784 
4785  // FIXME: add recoil for secondary weapons?
4786  // if (GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->isPistol || GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->isSilencedPistol || GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->isAkimbo)
4787  // {
4788  // pitchAdd = 2 + rand() % 3;
4789  // }
4790 
4791  if (GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->firingMode & WEAPON_FIRING_MODE_AUTOMATIC)
4792  {
4793  pitchAdd *= (1 + rand() % 3);
4794  }
4795  else if (CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->type, (WEAPON_TYPE_RIFLE | WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPED)))
4796  {
4797  // scoped weapon avoid yaw recoil (but FG42)
4798  yawRandom = 0;
4799  }
4800 
4801  // calc the recoil
4802  recoil[YAW] = crandom() * yawRandom;
4803  recoil[ROLL] = -recoil[YAW]; // why not
4804  recoil[PITCH] = -pitchAdd;
4805 
4806  // scale it up a bit (easier to modify this while tweaking)
4807  VectorScale(recoil, 30, recoil);
4808 
4809  // set the recoil
4810  VectorCopy(recoil, cg.kickAVel);
4811 }
4812 
4817 void CG_FireWeapon(centity_t *cent)
4818 {
4819  weaponInfo_t *weap;
4820 
4821  if (BG_PlayerMounted(cent->currentState.eFlags))
4822  {
4823  // quick hack for EF_MOUNTEDTANK, need to change this - likely it needs to use viewlocked as well
4824  if (cent->currentState.eFlags & EF_MOUNTEDTANK)
4825  {
4826  if (IS_MOUNTED_TANK_BROWNING(cent->currentState.number))
4827  {
4828  trap_S_StartSound(NULL, cent->currentState.number, CHAN_WEAPON, cgs.media.hWeaponSnd_2);
4829  }
4830  else
4831  {
4832  trap_S_StartSound(NULL, cent->currentState.number, CHAN_WEAPON, cgs.media.hWeaponSnd);
4833  }
4834  }
4835  else if (cent->currentState.eFlags & EF_AAGUN_ACTIVE)
4836  {
4837  trap_S_StartSound(NULL, cent->currentState.number, CHAN_WEAPON, cgs.media.hflakWeaponSnd);
4838  }
4839  else
4840  {
4841  trap_S_StartSound(NULL, cent->currentState.number, CHAN_WEAPON, cgs.media.hWeaponSnd);
4842  }
4843 
4844  if (cg_brassTime.integer > 0)
4845  {
4846  CG_MachineGunEjectBrass(cent);
4847  }
4848 
4849  if (cg_muzzleFlash.integer)
4850  {
4851  cent->muzzleFlashTime = cg.time;
4852  }
4853  else
4854  {
4855  cent->muzzleFlashTime = 0;
4856  }
4857 
4858  return;
4859  }
4860 
4861  if (cent->currentState.weapon == WP_NONE)
4862  {
4863  return;
4864  }
4865 
4866  if (cent->currentState.weapon >= WP_NUM_WEAPONS)
4867  {
4868  CG_Error("CG_FireWeapon: ent->weapon >= WP_NUM_WEAPONS\n");
4869  }
4870 
4871  weap = &cg_weapons[cent->currentState.weapon];
4872 
4873  if (cent->currentState.clientNum == cg.snap->ps.clientNum)
4874  {
4875  cg.lastFiredWeapon = cent->currentState.weapon;
4876 
4877  // kick angles
4878  CG_WeaponFireRecoil(cent->currentState.weapon);
4879 
4880  if (CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(cent->currentState.weapon)->type, WEAPON_TYPE_MORTAR | WEAPON_TYPE_SET))
4881  {
4882  cg.mortarImpactTime = -1;
4883  cg.mortarFireAngles[PITCH] = cg.predictedPlayerState.viewangles[PITCH];
4884  cg.mortarFireAngles[YAW] = cg.predictedPlayerState.viewangles[YAW];
4885  }
4886  }
4887 
4888  // mark the entity as muzzle flashing, so when it is added it will
4889  // append the flash to the weapon model
4890  if (cg_muzzleFlash.integer)
4891  {
4892  cent->muzzleFlashTime = cg.time;
4893  }
4894  else
4895  {
4896  cent->muzzleFlashTime = 0;
4897  }
4898 
4899  // lightning gun only does this on initial press
4900  if (cent->currentState.weapon == WP_FLAMETHROWER && cent->pe.lightningFiring)
4901  {
4902  return;
4903  }
4904 
4905  // "throwing effort" when grenade is launched far enough
4906  if ((GetWeaponTableData(cent->currentState.weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_GRENADE) && cent->currentState.apos.trBase[0] > 0)
4907  {
4908  return;
4909  }
4910 
4911  if (!(cent->currentState.eFlags & EF_ZOOMING)) // don't play sounds or eject brass if zoomed in
4912  {
4913  int c = weap->flashSound.count;
4914  sfxHandle_t firesound = 0;
4915  sfxHandle_t fireEchosound = 0;
4916 
4917  if (c)
4918  {
4919  c = rand() % c;
4920 
4921  firesound = weap->flashSound.sounds[c];
4922  fireEchosound = weap->flashEchoSound.sounds[c];
4923  }
4924 
4925  // try to use the lastShotSound, but don't assume it's there.
4926  // if a weapon without the sound calls it, keep regular fire sound
4927  if ((cent->currentState.event & ~EV_EVENT_BITS) == EV_FIRE_WEAPON_LASTSHOT)
4928  {
4929  c = weap->lastShotSound.count;
4930 
4931  if (c)
4932  {
4933  c = rand() % c;
4934 
4935  firesound = weap->lastShotSound.sounds[c];
4936  fireEchosound = weap->flashEchoSound.sounds[c];
4937  }
4938  }
4939 
4940  if (firesound)
4941  {
4942  trap_S_StartSound(NULL, cent->currentState.number, CHAN_WEAPON, firesound);
4943 
4944  if (fireEchosound) // check for echo
4945  {
4946  vec3_t porg, gorg, norm; // player/gun origin
4947  float gdist;
4948 
4949  VectorCopy(cent->currentState.pos.trBase, gorg);
4950  VectorCopy(cg.refdef_current->vieworg, porg);
4951  VectorSubtract(gorg, porg, norm);
4952  gdist = VectorNormalize(norm);
4953 
4954  if (gdist > 512 && gdist < 4096) // temp dist. TODO: use numbers that are weapon specific
4955  { // use gorg as the new sound origin
4956  VectorMA(cg.refdef_current->vieworg, 64, norm, gorg); // sound-on-a-stick
4957  trap_S_StartSoundEx(gorg, cent->currentState.number, CHAN_WEAPON, fireEchosound, SND_NOCUT);
4958  }
4959  }
4960  }
4961 
4962  // do brass ejection
4963  if (weap->ejectBrassFunc && cg_brassTime.integer > 0)
4964  {
4965  weap->ejectBrassFunc(cent);
4966  }
4967  }
4968 }
4969 
4979 void CG_AddSparks(vec3_t origin, vec3_t dir, int speed, int duration, int count, float randScale)
4980 {
4981  localEntity_t *le;
4982  refEntity_t *re;
4983  vec3_t velocity;
4984  int i;
4985 
4986  for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
4987  {
4988  le = CG_AllocLocalEntity();
4989  re = &le->refEntity;
4990 
4991  VectorSet(velocity, dir[0] + crandom() * randScale, dir[1] + crandom() * randScale, dir[2] + crandom() * randScale);
4992  VectorScale(velocity, (float)speed, velocity);
4993 
4994  le->leType = LE_SPARK;
4995  le->startTime = cg.time;
4996  le->endTime = le->startTime + duration - (int)(0.5f * random() * duration);
4997  le->lastTrailTime = cg.time;
4998 
4999  VectorCopy(origin, re->origin);
5000  AxisCopy(axisDefault, re->axis);
5001 
5002  le->pos.trType = TR_GRAVITY_LOW;
5003  VectorCopy(origin, le->pos.trBase);
5004  VectorMA(le->pos.trBase, 2 + random() * 4, dir, le->pos.trBase);
5005  VectorCopy(velocity, le->pos.trDelta);
5006  le->pos.trTime = cg.time;
5007 
5008  le->refEntity.customShader = cgs.media.sparkParticleShader;
5009 
5010  le->bounceFactor = 0.9f;
5011 
5012  //le->leBounceSoundType = LEBS_BLOOD;
5013  //le->leMarkType = LEMT_BLOOD;
5014  }
5015 }
5016 
5026 void CG_AddBulletParticles(vec3_t origin, vec3_t dir, int speed, int duration, int count, float randScale)
5027 {
5028  vec3_t velocity, pos;
5029  int i;
5030 
5031  // add the falling particles
5032  for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
5033  {
5034  VectorSet(velocity, dir[0] + crandom() * randScale, dir[1] + crandom() * randScale, dir[2] + crandom() * randScale);
5035  VectorScale(velocity, (float)speed, velocity);
5036 
5037  VectorCopy(origin, pos);
5038  VectorMA(pos, 2 + random() * 4, dir, pos);
5039 
5040  CG_ParticleBulletDebris(pos, velocity, 300 + rand() % 300);
5041  }
5042 }
5043 
5057 void CG_AddDirtBulletParticles(vec3_t origin, vec3_t dir, int speed, int duration, int count, float randScale, float width, float height, float alpha, qhandle_t shader)
5058 {
5059  vec3_t velocity, pos;
5060  int i;
5061 
5062  // add the big falling particle
5063  VectorSet(velocity, 0, 0, (float)speed);
5064  VectorCopy(origin, pos);
5065 
5066  CG_ParticleDirtBulletDebris_Core(pos, velocity, duration, width, height, alpha, shader); //600 + rand()%300 ); // keep central one
5067 
5068  for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
5069  {
5070  VectorSet(velocity, dir[0] * crandom() * speed * randScale, dir[1] * crandom() * speed * randScale, dir[2] * random() * speed);
5071  CG_ParticleDirtBulletDebris_Core(pos, velocity, duration + (rand() % (duration >> 1)), width, height, alpha, shader);
5072  }
5073 }
5074 
5079 void CG_RandomDebris(localEntity_t *le)
5080 {
5081  int i = rand() % 5;
5082 
5083  if (i == 0)
5084  {
5085  le->refEntity.hModel = cgs.media.debFabric[1];
5086  le->leBounceSoundType = LEBS_BONE;
5087  }
5088  else if (i == 1)
5089  {
5090  le->refEntity.hModel = cgs.media.shardMetal1;
5091  le->leBounceSoundType = LEBS_METAL;
5092  }
5093  else if (i == 2)
5094  {
5095  le->refEntity.hModel = cgs.media.shardMetal2;
5096  le->leBounceSoundType = LEBS_METAL;
5097  }
5098  else if (i == 3)
5099  {
5100  le->refEntity.hModel = cgs.media.debRock[1];
5101  le->leBounceSoundType = LEBS_ROCK;
5102  }
5103  else if (i == 4)
5104  {
5105  le->refEntity.hModel = cgs.media.debRock[0];
5106  le->leBounceSoundType = LEBS_ROCK;
5107  }
5108  else
5109  {
5110  le->refEntity.hModel = cgs.media.debRock[2];
5111  le->leBounceSoundType = LEBS_ROCK;
5112  }
5113 }
5114 
5124 void CG_AddDebris(vec3_t origin, vec3_t dir, int speed, int duration, int count, trace_t *trace)
5125 {
5126  localEntity_t *le;
5127  refEntity_t *re;
5128  vec3_t velocity, unitvel;
5129  float timeAdd;
5130  int i;
5131 
5132  for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
5133  {
5134  le = CG_AllocLocalEntity();
5135  re = &le->refEntity;
5136 
5137  VectorSet(unitvel, dir[0] + crandom() * 0.9f, dir[1] + crandom() * 0.9f, Q_fabs(dir[2]) > 0.5f ? dir[2] * (0.2f + 0.8f * random()) : random() * 0.6f);
5138  VectorScale(unitvel, (float)speed + (float)speed * 0.5f * crandom(), velocity);
5139 
5140  le->leType = LE_DEBRIS;
5141  le->startTime = cg.time;
5142  // FIXME: this is such a waste - change to (or even drop the multiplicator *2)
5143  // le->endTime = le->startTime + 2 * duration;
5144  // functions calling CG_AddDebris already creating randomnesses - adjust these and do a clean duration param
5145  le->endTime = le->startTime + duration + (int)((float)duration * 0.8f * crandom());
5146  le->lastTrailTime = cg.time;
5147 
5148  VectorCopy(origin, re->origin);
5149  AxisCopy(axisDefault, re->axis);
5150 
5151  le->pos.trType = TR_GRAVITY_LOW;
5152  VectorCopy(origin, le->pos.trBase);
5153  VectorCopy(velocity, le->pos.trDelta);
5154  le->pos.trTime = cg.time;
5155 
5156  timeAdd = 10.0f + random() * 40.0f;
5157  BG_EvaluateTrajectory(&le->pos, cg.time + (int)timeAdd, le->pos.trBase, qfalse, -1);
5158 
5159  le->bounceFactor = 0.5;
5160  le->effectWidth = 5 + random() * 5;
5161  le->effectFlags |= 1; // smoke trail
5162 
5163  //le->leMarkType = LEMT_BLOOD;
5164 
5165  // WIP
5166  // add model & properties of extended debris elements
5167  // TODO: find better models and/or extend ...
5168  // TODO: make dependant from surface (snow etc and use related models/sounds) and or weapon
5169  // TODO: find a client cvar so purists can disable (see CG_AddLocalEntities)
5170  if (cg_visualEffects.integer && trace) // && user enabled
5171  {
5172  // airborn or solid with no surface set - just throw projectile fragments
5173  if (trace->fraction == 1.0f || ((trace->contents & CONTENTS_SOLID) && !trace->surfaceFlags))
5174  {
5175  int j;
5176 
5177  if (rand() % 2)
5178  {
5179  le->refEntity.hModel = cgs.media.shardMetal1; // FIXME: find some other models
5180  }
5181  else
5182  {
5183  le->refEntity.hModel = cgs.media.shardMetal2;
5184  }
5185 
5186  // scale
5187  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
5188  {
5189  VectorScale(le->refEntity.axis[i], (rand() % 10 + 1) * .1f, le->refEntity.axis[i]);
5190  }
5191 
5192  le->leBounceSoundType = LEBS_METAL;
5193  continue;
5194  }
5195 
5196  if (trace->surfaceFlags & SURF_WOOD)
5197  {
5198  le->refEntity.hModel = cgs.media.debWood[rand() % 6];
5199  le->leBounceSoundType = LEBS_WOOD;
5200  continue;
5201  }
5202 
5203  /*
5204  CG_Printf("--> c:%i sf:%i\n", trace->contents, trace->surfaceFlags);
5205 
5206  if (trace->surfaceFlags & SURF_GRAVEL)
5207  {
5208  CG_Printf("ON GRAVEL\n");
5209  }
5210 
5211  if (trace->surfaceFlags & SURF_SNOW)
5212  {
5213  CG_Printf("ON SNOW\n");
5214  }
5215 
5216  if (trace->surfaceFlags & SURF_GRASS)
5217  {
5218  CG_Printf("ON GRASS\n");
5219  }
5220 
5221  if (trace->surfaceFlags & SURF_CERAMIC)
5222  {
5223  CG_Printf("ON CERAMIC\n");
5224  }
5225 
5226  // ---
5227 
5228  if (trace->surfaceFlags & SURF_GLASS)
5229  {
5230  CG_Printf("ON GLASS\n");
5231  }
5232 
5233  if (trace->surfaceFlags & SURF_METAL)
5234  {
5235  CG_Printf("ON METAL\n");
5236  }
5237 
5238  if (trace->surfaceFlags & SURF_ROOF)
5239  {
5240  CG_Printf("ON ROOF\n");
5241  }
5242 
5243  if (trace->surfaceFlags & SURF_CARPET)
5244  {
5245  CG_Printf("ON CARPET\n");
5246  }
5247 
5248  // --
5249 
5250  if (trace->contents & CONTENTS_WATER)
5251  {
5252  CG_Printf("ON WATER\n");
5253  }
5254 
5255  if (trace->contents & CONTENTS_BODY)
5256  {
5257  CG_Printf("ON BODY\n");
5258  }
5259  if (trace->contents & CONTENTS_CORPSE)
5260  {
5261  CG_Printf("ON CORPSE\n");
5262  }
5263  */
5264 
5265  // FIXME: replace with surface related models
5266  CG_RandomDebris(le);
5267  }
5268  else
5269  {
5270  // if there is no trace just throw random debris
5271  CG_RandomDebris(le);
5272  }
5273  }
5274 }
5275 
5284 void CG_WaterRipple(qhandle_t shader, vec3_t loc, vec3_t dir, int size, int lifetime)
5285 {
5286  localEntity_t *le = CG_AllocLocalEntity();
5287  refEntity_t *re;
5288 
5289  le->leType = LE_SCALE_FADE;
5290  le->leFlags = LEF_PUFF_DONT_SCALE;
5291 
5292  le->startTime = cg.time;
5293  le->endTime = cg.time + lifetime;
5294  le->lifeRate = 1.0f / (le->endTime - le->startTime);
5295 
5296  re = &le->refEntity;
5297  VectorCopy(loc, re->origin);
5298  re->shaderTime = cg.time / 1000.0f;
5299  re->reType = RT_SPLASH;
5300  re->radius = size;
5301  re->customShader = shader;
5302  re->shaderRGBA[0] = 0xff;
5303  re->shaderRGBA[1] = 0xff;
5304  re->shaderRGBA[2] = 0xff;
5305  re->shaderRGBA[3] = 0xff;
5306  le->color[3] = 1.0f;
5307 }
5308 
5314 soundSurface_t CG_GetSoundSurfaceIndex(int surfFlags)
5315 {
5316  soundSurface_t soundSurfaceIndex;
5317 
5318  for (soundSurfaceIndex = 0; soundSurfaceIndex < W_MAX_SND_SURF; soundSurfaceIndex++)
5319  {
5320  if (surfFlags & soundSurfaceTable[soundSurfaceIndex].surfaceType)
5321  {
5322  return soundSurfaceIndex;
5323  }
5324  }
5325 
5326  return W_SND_SURF_DEFAULT;
5327 }
5328 
5335 sfxHandle_t CG_GetRandomSoundSurface(weaponSounds_t *weaponSounds, soundSurface_t surf, qboolean forceDefault)
5336 {
5337  int c = weaponSounds[surf].count;
5338 
5339  // if no sound found for given surface, force using default one if exist
5340  if (!c && forceDefault)
5341  {
5342  surf = W_SND_SURF_DEFAULT;
5343  c = weaponSounds[surf].count;
5344  }
5345 
5346  if (c)
5347  {
5348  c = rand() % c;
5349 
5350  return weaponSounds[surf].sounds[c];
5351  }
5352 
5353  return 0;
5354 }
5355 
5366 void CG_MeleeImpact(int weapon, int missileEffect, vec3_t origin, vec3_t dir, int surfFlags, float *radius, int *markDuration)
5367 {
5368  if (missileEffect == PS_FX_COMMON)
5369  {
5370  *radius = 1 + rand() % 2;
5371 
5372  CG_AddBulletParticles(origin, dir, 20, 800, 3 + rand() % 6, 1.0f);
5373 
5374  *markDuration = cg_markTime.integer;
5375  }
5376 }
5377 
5388 void CG_BulletImpact(int weapon, int missileEffect, vec3_t origin, vec3_t dir, int surfFlags, float *radius, int *markDuration)
5389 {
5390  if (missileEffect == PS_FX_NONE)
5391  {
5392  CG_AddSparks(origin, dir, 350, 200, 15 + rand() % 7, 0.2f);
5393  }
5394  else if (missileEffect == PS_FX_COMMON) // just do a little smoke puff
5395  {
5396  vec3_t d, o;
5397  VectorMA(origin, 12, dir, o);
5398  VectorScale(dir, 7, d);
5399  d[2] += 16;
5400 
5401  // use dirt images
5402  if ((surfFlags & SURF_GRASS) || (surfFlags & SURF_GRAVEL)) // added SURF_SNOW
5403  { // some debris particles
5404  CG_AddDirtBulletParticles(origin, dir, 190, 900, 5, 0.5f, 80, 16, 0.5f, cgs.media.dirtParticle1Shader);
5405  }
5406  else if (surfFlags & SURF_SNOW)
5407  {
5408  CG_AddDirtBulletParticles(origin, dir, 190, 900, 5, 0.25f, 80, 32, 0.5f, cgs.media.dirtParticle2Shader);
5409  }
5410  else
5411  {
5412  CG_ParticleImpactSmokePuff(cgs.media.smokeParticleShader, o);
5413 
5414  // some debris particles
5415  CG_AddBulletParticles(origin, dir, 20, 800, 3 + rand() % 6, 1.0f); // rand scale
5416 
5417  // just do a little one
5418  //if (rand() % 3 == 0)
5419  //{
5420  // CG_AddSparks(origin, dir, 450, 300, 3 + rand() % 3, 0.5); // rand scale
5421  //}
5422  }
5423 
5424  // optimization, only spawn the bullet hole if we are close
5425  // enough to see it, this way we can leave other marks around a lot
5426  // longer, since most of the time we can't actually see the bullet holes
5427  // - small modification. only do this for non-rifles (so you can see your shots hitting when you're zooming with a rifle scope)
5428  if ((GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPED) || (Distance(cg.refdef_current->vieworg, origin) < 384))
5429  {
5430  // mark and sound can potentially use the surface for override values
5431  //mark = cgs.media.bulletMarkShader; // default
5432  *radius = 1.0f + 0.5f * (rand() % 2);
5433 
5434  // set mark duration
5435  *markDuration = cg_markTime.integer;
5436  }
5437  }
5438  else if (missileEffect == PS_FX_WATER)
5439  {
5440  localEntity_t *le;
5441 
5442  // needed to do the CG_WaterRipple using a localent since I needed the timer reset on the shader for each shot
5443  CG_WaterRipple(cgs.media.wakeMarkShaderAnim, origin, tv(0, 0, 1), 32, 1000);
5444  CG_AddDirtBulletParticles(origin, dir, 190, 900, 5, 0.5f, 80, 16, 0.125f, cgs.media.dirtParticle2Shader);
5445 
5446  // play a water splash
5447  le = CG_MakeExplosion(origin, dir, cgs.media.waterSplashModel, cgs.media.waterSplashShader, 250, qfalse);
5448  VectorSet(le->lightColor, 1, 1, 0);
5449  }
5450 }
5451 
5462 void CG_SmallExplosionImpact(int weapon, int missileEffect, vec3_t origin, vec3_t dir, int surfFlags, float *radius, int *markDuration)
5463 {
5464  trace_t trace;
5465  vec3_t tmpv;
5466 
5467  *markDuration = cg_markTime.integer * 3;
5468 
5469  if (missileEffect == PS_FX_WATER)
5470  {
5471  localEntity_t *le;
5472 
5473  VectorCopy(origin, tmpv);
5474  tmpv[2] += 10000;
5475 
5476  trap_CM_BoxTrace(&trace, tmpv, origin, NULL, NULL, 0, MASK_WATER);
5477  CG_WaterRipple(cgs.media.wakeMarkShaderAnim, trace.endpos, dir, 150, 1000);
5478 
5479  CG_AddDirtBulletParticles(trace.endpos, dir, 400, 900, 15, 0.5f, 256, 128, 0.125f, cgs.media.dirtParticle2Shader);
5480 
5481  // play a water splash
5482  le = CG_MakeExplosion(origin, dir, cgs.media.waterSplashModel, cgs.media.waterSplashShader, 1000, qtrue);
5483  le->light = 300;
5484  VectorSet(le->lightColor, 0.75f, 0.5f, 0.1f);
5485  }
5486  else
5487  {
5488  vec3_t tmpv2, sprOrg, sprVel;
5489 
5490  // explosion sprite animation
5491  VectorMA(origin, 16, dir, sprOrg);
5492  VectorScale(dir, 100, sprVel);
5493 
5494  VectorCopy(origin, tmpv);
5495  tmpv[2] += 20;
5496  VectorCopy(origin, tmpv2);
5497  tmpv2[2] -= 20;
5498  trap_CM_BoxTrace(&trace, tmpv, tmpv2, NULL, NULL, 0, MASK_SHOT);
5499 
5500  if ((trace.surfaceFlags & SURF_GRASS) || (trace.surfaceFlags & SURF_GRAVEL))
5501  {
5502  CG_AddDirtBulletParticles(origin, dir, 400, 2000, 10, 0.5f, 200, 75, 0.25f, cgs.media.dirtParticle1Shader);
5503  }
5504 
5505  CG_ParticleExplosion("explode1", sprOrg, sprVel, 700, 60, 240, qtrue);
5506  CG_AddDebris(origin, dir, 280, 1400, 7 + rand() % 2, &trace);
5507  }
5508 }
5509 
5520 void CG_BigExplosionImpact(int weapon, int missileEffect, vec3_t origin, vec3_t dir, int surfFlags, float *radius, int *markDuration)
5521 {
5522  trace_t trace;
5523  vec3_t tmpv;
5524 
5525  *markDuration = cg_markTime.integer * 3;
5526 
5527  if (missileEffect == PS_FX_WATER)
5528  {
5529  localEntity_t *le;
5530 
5531  VectorCopy(origin, tmpv);
5532  tmpv[2] += 10000;
5533 
5534  trap_CM_BoxTrace(&trace, tmpv, origin, NULL, NULL, 0, MASK_WATER);
5535  CG_WaterRipple(cgs.media.wakeMarkShaderAnim, trace.endpos, dir, 300, 2000);
5536 
5537  CG_AddDirtBulletParticles(trace.endpos, dir, (int)(400 + random() * 200), 900, 15, 0.5f, 512, 128, 0.125f, cgs.media.dirtParticle2Shader);
5538  CG_AddDirtBulletParticles(trace.endpos, dir, (int)(400 + random() * 600), 1400, 15, 0.5f, 128, 512, 0.125f, cgs.media.dirtParticle2Shader);
5539 
5540  // play a water splash
5541  le = CG_MakeExplosion(origin, dir, cgs.media.waterSplashModel, cgs.media.waterSplashShader, 1000, qtrue);
5542  le->light = 600;
5543  VectorSet(le->lightColor, 0.75f, 0.5f, 0.1f);
5544  }
5545  else
5546  {
5547  int i, j;
5548  vec3_t tmpv2, sprOrg, sprVel;
5549 
5550  // explosion sprite animation
5551  VectorMA(origin, 24, dir, sprOrg);
5552  VectorScale(dir, 64, sprVel);
5553 
5554  VectorCopy(origin, tmpv);
5555  tmpv[2] += 20;
5556  VectorCopy(origin, tmpv2);
5557  tmpv2[2] -= 20;
5558  trap_CM_BoxTrace(&trace, tmpv, tmpv2, NULL, NULL, 0, MASK_SHOT);
5559 
5560  if ((trace.surfaceFlags & SURF_GRASS) || (trace.surfaceFlags & SURF_GRAVEL))
5561  {
5562  CG_AddDirtBulletParticles(origin, dir, (int)(400 + random() * 200), 3000, 10, 0.5f, 400, 256, 0.25f, cgs.media.dirtParticle1Shader);
5563  }
5564 
5565  CG_ParticleExplosion("explode1", sprOrg, sprVel, 1600, 20, (int)(200 + random() * 400), qtrue);
5566 
5567  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) // random vector based on plane normal so explosions move away from walls/dirt/etc
5568  {
5569  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
5570  {
5571  sprOrg[j] = origin[j] + 50 * crandom();
5572  sprVel[j] = 0.35f * crandom();
5573  }
5574 
5575  VectorAdd(sprVel, trace.plane.normal, sprVel);
5576  VectorScale(sprVel, 300, sprVel);
5577  CG_ParticleExplosion("explode1", sprOrg, sprVel, 1600, 40, 260 + rand() % 120, qfalse);
5578  }
5579 
5580  CG_AddDebris(origin, dir, (int)(400 + random() * 200), rand() % 2000 + 1000, 5 + rand() % 5, &trace);
5581  }
5582 }
5583 
5594 void CG_MapMortarImpact(int weapon, int missileEffect, vec3_t origin, vec3_t dir, int surfFlags, float *radius, int *markDuration)
5595 {
5596  trace_t trace;
5597  vec3_t tmpv;
5598 
5599  *markDuration = cg_markTime.integer * 3;
5600 
5601  if (missileEffect == PS_FX_WATER)
5602  {
5603  localEntity_t *le;
5604 
5605  VectorCopy(origin, tmpv);
5606  tmpv[2] += 10000;
5607 
5608  trap_CM_BoxTrace(&trace, tmpv, origin, NULL, NULL, 0, MASK_WATER);
5609  CG_WaterRipple(cgs.media.wakeMarkShaderAnim, trace.endpos, dir, 150, 1000);
5610  CG_AddDirtBulletParticles(trace.endpos, dir, 900, 1800, 15, 0.5f, 350, 128, 0.125f, cgs.media.dirtParticle2Shader);
5611 
5612  // play a water splash
5613  le = CG_MakeExplosion(origin, dir, cgs.media.waterSplashModel, cgs.media.waterSplashShader, 1000, qtrue);
5614  le->light = 300;
5615  VectorSet(le->lightColor, 0.75f, 0.5f, 0.1f);
5616  }
5617  else
5618  {
5619  int i, j;
5620  vec3_t tmpv2, sprOrg, sprVel;
5621 
5622  VectorScale(dir, 16, sprVel);
5623 
5624  VectorCopy(origin, tmpv);
5625  tmpv[2] += 20;
5626  VectorCopy(origin, tmpv2);
5627  tmpv2[2] -= 20;
5628  trap_CM_BoxTrace(&trace, tmpv, tmpv2, NULL, NULL, 0, MASK_SHOT);
5629 
5630  if ((trace.surfaceFlags & SURF_GRASS) || (trace.surfaceFlags & SURF_GRAVEL))
5631  {
5632  CG_AddDirtBulletParticles(origin, dir, 600, 2000, 10, 0.5f, 275, 125, 0.25f, cgs.media.dirtParticle1Shader);
5633  }
5634 
5635  for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
5636  {
5637  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
5638  {
5639  sprOrg[j] = origin[j] + 64 * dir[j] + 24 * crandom();
5640  }
5641 
5642  sprVel[2] += rand() % 50;
5643  CG_ParticleExplosion("blacksmokeanim", sprOrg, sprVel, 3500 + rand() % 250, 10, 250 + rand() % 60, qfalse);
5644  }
5645 
5646  VectorMA(origin, 24, dir, sprOrg);
5647  VectorScale(dir, 64, sprVel);
5648  CG_ParticleExplosion("explode1", sprOrg, sprVel, 1000, 20, 300, qtrue);
5649  }
5650 }
5651 
5662 void CG_DynamiteExplosionImpact(int weapon, int missileEffect, vec3_t origin, vec3_t dir, int surfFlags, float *radius, int *markDuration)
5663 {
5664  trace_t trace;
5665  vec3_t tmpv;
5666 
5667  *markDuration = cg_markTime.integer * 3;
5668 
5669  // biggie dynamite explosions that mean it -- dynamite is biggest explode, so it gets extra crap thrown on
5670  // check for water/dirt spurt
5671  if (missileEffect == PS_FX_WATER)
5672  {
5673  localEntity_t *le;
5674 
5675  VectorCopy(origin, tmpv);
5676  tmpv[2] += 10000;
5677 
5678  trap_CM_BoxTrace(&trace, tmpv, origin, NULL, NULL, 0, MASK_WATER);
5679  CG_WaterRipple(cgs.media.wakeMarkShaderAnim, trace.endpos, dir, 300, 2000);
5680 
5681  CG_AddDirtBulletParticles(trace.endpos, dir, (int)(400 + random() * 200), 900, 15, 0.5f, 512, 128, 0.125f, cgs.media.dirtParticle2Shader);
5682  CG_AddDirtBulletParticles(trace.endpos, dir, (int)(400 + random() * 600), 1400, 15, 0.5f, 128, 512, 0.125f, cgs.media.dirtParticle2Shader);
5683 
5684  // play a water splash
5685  le = CG_MakeExplosion(origin, dir, cgs.media.waterSplashModel, cgs.media.waterSplashShader, 1000, qtrue);
5686  le->light = 300;
5687  VectorSet(le->lightColor, 0.75f, 0.5f, 0.1f);
5688  }
5689  else
5690  {
5691  int i, j;
5692  vec3_t tmpv2, sprOrg, sprVel;
5693 
5694  VectorSet(tmpv, origin[0], origin[1], origin[2] + 20);
5695  VectorSet(tmpv2, origin[0], origin[1], origin[2] - 20);
5696  trap_CM_BoxTrace(&trace, tmpv, tmpv2, NULL, NULL, 0, MASK_SHOT);
5697 
5698  if ((trace.surfaceFlags & SURF_GRASS) || (trace.surfaceFlags & SURF_GRAVEL))
5699  {
5700  CG_AddDirtBulletParticles(origin, dir, (int)(400 + random() * 200), 3000, 10, 0.5f, 400, 256, 0.25f, cgs.media.dirtParticle1Shader);
5701  }
5702 
5703  for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
5704  {
5705  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
5706  {
5707  sprOrg[j] = origin[j] + 150 * crandom();
5708  sprVel[j] = 0.35f * crandom();
5709  }
5710 
5711  VectorAdd(sprVel, trace.plane.normal, sprVel);
5712  VectorScale(sprVel, 130, sprVel);
5713  CG_ParticleExplosion("blacksmokeanim", sprOrg, sprVel, (int)(6000 + random() * 2000), 40, (int)(400 + random() * 200), qfalse);
5714  }
5715 
5716  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) // random vector based on plane normal so explosions move away from walls/dirt/etc
5717  {
5718  for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
5719  {
5720  sprOrg[j] = origin[j] + 100 * crandom();
5721  sprVel[j] = 0.65f * crandom(); // wider fireball spread
5722  }
5723 
5724  VectorAdd(sprVel, trace.plane.normal, sprVel);
5725  VectorScale(sprVel, random() * 100 + 300, sprVel);
5726  CG_ParticleExplosion("explode1", sprOrg, sprVel, 1000 + rand() % 1450, 40, (int)(400 + random() * 200), (i == 0 ? qtrue : qfalse));
5727  }
5728 
5729  CG_AddDebris(origin, dir, (int)(400 + random() * 200), rand() % 2000 + 1400, 12 + rand() % 12, &trace);
5730  }
5731 }
5732 
5744 void CG_MissileHitWall(int weapon, int missileEffect, vec3_t origin, vec3_t dir, int surfFlags, int sourceEnt)
5745 {
5746  soundSurface_t soundSurfaceIndex = W_SND_SURF_DEFAULT;
5747  qhandle_t mark;
5748  sfxHandle_t sfx, sfx2;
5749  int markDuration = 0;
5750  float radius;
5751 
5752  // no impact
5753  if (!cg_weapons[weapon].impactFunc)
5754  {
5755  return;
5756  }
5757 
5758  if (surfFlags & SURF_SKY)
5759  {
5760  return;
5761  }
5762 
5763  if (missileEffect == PS_FX_COMMON)
5764  {
5765  soundSurfaceIndex = CG_GetSoundSurfaceIndex(surfFlags);
5766  }
5767  else if (missileEffect == PS_FX_WATER)
5768  {
5769  soundSurfaceIndex = W_SND_SURF_WATER;
5770  }
5771  else if (missileEffect == PS_FX_FLESH)
5772  {
5773  soundSurfaceIndex = W_SND_SURF_FLESH;
5774  }
5775 
5776  sfx = CG_GetRandomSoundSurface(cg_weapons[weapon].impactSound, soundSurfaceIndex, qtrue);
5777  sfx2 = CG_GetRandomSoundSurface(cg_weapons[weapon].impactSound, W_SND_SURF_FAR, qfalse);
5778  mark = cg_weapons[weapon].impactMark[soundSurfaceIndex];
5779  radius = cg_weapons[weapon].impactMarkRadius;
5780 
5781  cg_weapons[weapon].impactFunc(weapon, missileEffect, origin, dir, surfFlags, &radius, &markDuration);
5782 
5783  // no mark found for given surface, force using default one if exist
5784  if (!mark)
5785  {
5786  mark = cg_weapons[weapon].impactMark[W_SND_SURF_DEFAULT];
5787  }
5788 
5789  if (sfx)
5790  {
5791  trap_S_StartSoundVControl(origin, sourceEnt, CHAN_AUTO, sfx, cg_weapons[weapon].impactSoundVolume);
5792  }
5793 
5794  // distant sounds for weapons with a broadcast fire sound (so you /always/ hear dynamite explosions)
5795  if (sfx2)
5796  {
5797  vec3_t porg, gorg, norm; // player/gun origin
5798  float gdist;
5799 
5800  VectorCopy(origin, gorg);
5801  VectorCopy(cg.refdef_current->vieworg, porg);
5802  VectorSubtract(gorg, porg, norm);
5803  gdist = VectorNormalize(norm);
5804 
5805  if (gdist > 1200 && gdist < 8000) // 1200 is max cam shakey dist (2*600) use gorg as the new sound origin
5806  {
5807  VectorMA(cg.refdef_current->vieworg, cg_weapons[weapon].impactSoundRange, norm, gorg); // non-distance falloff makes more sense; sfx2range was gdist*0.2
5808  // sfx2range is variable to give us minimum volume control different explosion sizes (see mortar, panzerfaust, and grenade)
5809  trap_S_StartSoundEx(gorg, sourceEnt, CHAN_WEAPON, sfx2, SND_NOCUT);
5810  }
5811  }
5812 
5813  // markDuration = cg_markTime.integer * x
5814  if (markDuration)
5815  {
5816  vec4_t projection;
5817 
5818  // omnidirectional explosion marks
5819  if (mark == cgs.media.burnMarkShader)
5820  {
5821  VectorSet(projection, 0, 0, -1);
5822  projection[3] = radius;
5823 
5824  trap_R_ProjectDecal(mark, 1, (vec3_t *) origin, projection, colorWhite, markDuration, (markDuration >> 4));
5825  }
5826  else if (mark)
5827  {
5828  vec3_t markOrigin;
5829 
5830  VectorSubtract(vec3_origin, dir, projection);
5831  projection[3] = radius * 32;
5832  VectorMA(origin, -16.0f, projection, markOrigin);
5833  // jitter markorigin a bit so they don't end up on an ordered grid
5834  markOrigin[0] += (random() - 0.5f);
5835  markOrigin[1] += (random() - 0.5f);
5836  markOrigin[2] += (random() - 0.5f);
5837  CG_ImpactMark(mark, markOrigin, projection, radius, random() * 360.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, markDuration);
5838  }
5839  }
5840 }
5841 
5847 void CG_MissileHitWallSmall(vec3_t origin, vec3_t dir)
5848 {
5849  vec3_t sprOrg, sprVel;
5850  static vec4_t projection = { 0, 0, -1.0f, 80.0f }; // {x,y,x,radius}
5851 
5852  // explosion sprite animation
5853  VectorMA(origin, 16, dir, sprOrg);
5854  VectorScale(dir, 64, sprVel);
5855 
5856  CG_ParticleExplosion("explode1", sprOrg, sprVel, 600, 6, 50, qtrue);
5857 
5858  // throw some debris
5859  CG_AddDebris(origin, dir, 280, 1400, 7 + rand() % 2, NULL);
5860 
5861  if (cgs.media.sfx_rockexp)
5862  {
5863  trap_S_StartSound(origin, -1, CHAN_AUTO, cgs.media.sfx_rockexp);
5864  }
5865 
5866  // impact mark
5867  if (cg_markTime.integer)
5868  {
5869  trap_R_ProjectDecal(cgs.media.burnMarkShader, 1, (vec3_t *) origin, projection, colorWhite, cg_markTime.integer, (cg_markTime.integer >> 4));
5870  }
5871 }
5872 
5881 void CG_MissileHitPlayer(int entityNum, int weapon, vec3_t origin, vec3_t dir, int fleshEntityNum)
5882 {
5883  CG_Bleed(origin, fleshEntityNum);
5884 
5885  // some weapons will make an explosion with the blood, while
5886  // others will just make the blood
5887 
5888  if (GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->type & (WEAPON_TYPE_GRENADE | WEAPON_TYPE_PANZER))
5889  {
5890  int effect;
5891 
5892  effect = (CG_PointContents(origin, 0) & CONTENTS_WATER) ? PS_FX_WATER : PS_FX_NONE;
5893 
5894  CG_MissileHitWall(weapon, effect, origin, dir, 0, entityNum); // like the old one
5895  }
5896  else if (GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_MELEE)
5897  {
5898  CG_MissileHitWall(weapon, PS_FX_FLESH, origin, dir, 0, entityNum); // this one makes the hitting fleshy sound. whee
5899  }
5900 }
5901 
5902 /*
5903 ============================================================================
5904 BULLETS
5905 ============================================================================
5906 */
5907 
5914 void CG_SpawnTracer(int sourceEnt, vec3_t pstart, vec3_t pend)
5915 {
5916  localEntity_t *le;
5917  float dist;
5918  vec3_t dir;
5919  vec3_t start, end;
5920 
5921  VectorCopy(pstart, start);
5922  VectorCopy(pend, end);
5923 
5924  // make MG42 tracers line up
5925  if (cg_entities[sourceEnt].currentState.eFlags & EF_MG42_ACTIVE) // FIXME: AAGUN
5926  {
5927  start[2] -= 42;
5928  }
5929 
5930  VectorSubtract(end, start, dir);
5931  dist = VectorNormalize(dir);
5932 
5933  if (dist < 2.0f * cg_tracerLength.value)
5934  {
5935  return; // segment isnt long enough, dont bother
5936  }
5937 
5938  if (sourceEnt < cgs.maxclients)
5939  {
5940  // for visual purposes, find the actual tag_weapon for this client
5941  // and offset the start and end accordingly
5942  if (!((cg_entities[sourceEnt].currentState.eFlags & EF_MG42_ACTIVE) || (cg_entities[sourceEnt].currentState.eFlags & EF_AAGUN_ACTIVE))) // not MG42
5943  {
5944  orientation_t orientation;
5945 
5946  if (CG_GetWeaponTag(sourceEnt, "tag_flash", &orientation))
5947  {
5948  vec3_t ofs;
5949
