5950  VectorSubtract(orientation.origin, start, ofs);
5951 
5952  if (VectorLength(ofs) < 64)
5953  {
5954  VectorAdd(start, ofs, start);
5955  }
5956  }
5957  }
5958  }
5959 
5960  // subtract the length of the tracer from the end point, so we dont go through the end point
5961  VectorMA(end, -cg_tracerLength.value, dir, end);
5962  dist = VectorDistance(start, end);
5963 
5964  le = CG_AllocLocalEntity();
5965  le->leType = LE_MOVING_TRACER;
5966  le->startTime = cg.time - (cg.frametime ? (rand() % cg.frametime) / 2 : 0);
5967  le->endTime = (int)(le->startTime + 1000.0f * dist / cg_tracerSpeed.value);
5968 
5969  le->pos.trType = TR_LINEAR;
5970  le->pos.trTime = le->startTime;
5971  VectorCopy(start, le->pos.trBase);
5972  VectorScale(dir, cg_tracerSpeed.value, le->pos.trDelta);
5973 }
5974 
5980 void CG_DrawTracer(const vec3_t start, const vec3_t finish)
5981 {
5982  vec3_t forward, right;
5983  polyVert_t verts[4];
5984  vec3_t line;
5985 
5986  VectorSubtract(finish, start, forward);
5987 
5988  line[0] = DotProduct(forward, cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[1]);
5989  line[1] = DotProduct(forward, cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[2]);
5990 
5991  VectorScale(cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[1], line[1], right);
5992  VectorMA(right, -line[0], cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[2], right);
5993  VectorNormalize(right);
5994 
5995  VectorMA(finish, cg_tracerWidth.value, right, verts[0].xyz);
5996  verts[0].st[0] = 1;
5997  verts[0].st[1] = 1;
5998  verts[0].modulate[0] = 255;
5999  verts[0].modulate[1] = 255;
6000  verts[0].modulate[2] = 255;
6001  verts[0].modulate[3] = 255;
6002 
6003  VectorMA(finish, -cg_tracerWidth.value, right, verts[1].xyz);
6004  verts[1].st[0] = 1;
6005  verts[1].st[1] = 0;
6006  verts[1].modulate[0] = 255;
6007  verts[1].modulate[1] = 255;
6008  verts[1].modulate[2] = 255;
6009  verts[1].modulate[3] = 255;
6010 
6011  VectorMA(start, -cg_tracerWidth.value, right, verts[2].xyz);
6012  verts[2].st[0] = 0;
6013  verts[2].st[1] = 0;
6014  verts[2].modulate[0] = 255;
6015  verts[2].modulate[1] = 255;
6016  verts[2].modulate[2] = 255;
6017  verts[2].modulate[3] = 255;
6018 
6019  VectorMA(start, cg_tracerWidth.value, right, verts[3].xyz);
6020  verts[3].st[0] = 0;
6021  verts[3].st[1] = 1;
6022  verts[3].modulate[0] = 255;
6023  verts[3].modulate[1] = 255;
6024  verts[3].modulate[2] = 255;
6025  verts[3].modulate[3] = 255;
6026 
6027  trap_R_AddPolyToScene(cgs.media.tracerShader, 4, verts);
6028 }
6029 
6036 void CG_Tracer(const vec3_t source, const vec3_t dest, int sparks)
6037 {
6038  float len, begin, end;
6039  vec3_t start, finish;
6040  vec3_t forward;
6041 
6042  // tracer
6043  VectorSubtract(dest, source, forward);
6044  len = VectorNormalize(forward);
6045 
6046  // start at least a little ways from the muzzle
6047  if (len < 100 && !sparks)
6048  {
6049  return;
6050  }
6051 
6052  begin = 50 + random() * (len - 60);
6053  end = begin + cg_tracerLength.value;
6054 
6055  if (end > len)
6056  {
6057  end = len;
6058  }
6059 
6060  VectorMA(source, begin, forward, start);
6061  VectorMA(source, end, forward, finish);
6062 
6063  CG_DrawTracer(start, finish);
6064 }
6065 
6072 qboolean CG_CalcMuzzlePoint(int entityNum, vec3_t muzzle)
6073 {
6074  vec3_t forward, right, up;
6075  centity_t *cent;
6076 
6077  if (entityNum == cg.snap->ps.clientNum)
6078  {
6079  // see if we're attached to a gun
6080  if (cg.snap->ps.eFlags & EF_MG42_ACTIVE)
6081  {
6082  centity_t *mg42 = &cg_entities[cg.snap->ps.viewlocked_entNum];
6083  vec3_t forward;
6084 
6085  AngleVectors(cg.snap->ps.viewangles, forward, NULL, NULL);
6086  VectorMA(mg42->currentState.pos.trBase, 40, forward, muzzle); // was -36, made 40 to be in sync with the actual muzzleflash drawing
6087  muzzle[2] += cg.snap->ps.viewheight;
6088  }
6089  else if (cg.snap->ps.eFlags & EF_AAGUN_ACTIVE)
6090  {
6091  centity_t *aagun = &cg_entities[cg.snap->ps.viewlocked_entNum];
6092  vec3_t forward, right, up;
6093 
6094  AngleVectors(cg.snap->ps.viewangles, forward, right, up);
6095  VectorCopy(aagun->lerpOrigin, muzzle); // modelindex2 will already have been incremented on the server, so work out what it WAS then
6096  BG_AdjustAAGunMuzzleForBarrel(muzzle, forward, right, up, (aagun->currentState.modelindex2 + 3) % 4);
6097  }
6098  else if (cg.snap->ps.eFlags & EF_MOUNTEDTANK)
6099  {
6100  if (cg.renderingThirdPerson)
6101  {
6102  centity_t *tank = &cg_entities[cg_entities[cg.snap->ps.clientNum].tagParent];
6103 
6104  VectorCopy(tank->mountedMG42Flash.origin, muzzle);
6105  AngleVectors(cg.snap->ps.viewangles, forward, NULL, NULL);
6106  VectorMA(muzzle, 14, forward, muzzle);
6107  }
6108  else
6109  {
6110  // fix firstperson tank muzzle origin if drawgun is off
6111  if (cg_drawGun.integer != 1)
6112  {
6113  VectorCopy(cg.snap->ps.origin, muzzle);
6114  AngleVectors(cg.snap->ps.viewangles, forward, right, up);
6115  VectorMA(muzzle, 48, forward, muzzle);
6116  muzzle[2] += cg.snap->ps.viewheight;
6117  VectorMA(muzzle, 8, right, muzzle);
6118  }
6119  else
6120  {
6121  VectorCopy(cg.tankflashorg, muzzle);
6122  }
6123  }
6124  }
6125  else
6126  {
6127  VectorCopy(cg.snap->ps.origin, muzzle);
6128  muzzle[2] += cg.snap->ps.viewheight;
6129  AngleVectors(cg.snap->ps.viewangles, forward, NULL, NULL);
6130 
6131  if (CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(cg.snap->ps.weapon)->type, WEAPON_TYPE_MG | WEAPON_TYPE_SET))
6132  {
6133  VectorMA(muzzle, 36, forward, muzzle);
6134  }
6135  else
6136  {
6137  VectorMA(muzzle, 14, forward, muzzle);
6138  }
6139 
6140  AddLean(cg.snap->ps.viewangles, muzzle, cg.snap->ps.leanf);
6141  }
6142  return qtrue;
6143  }
6144 
6145  cent = &cg_entities[entityNum];
6146 
6147  if (cent->currentState.eFlags & EF_MG42_ACTIVE)
6148  {
6149  if (cent->currentState.eType == ET_MG42_BARREL)
6150  {
6151  vec3_t forward;
6152 
6153  VectorCopy(cent->currentState.pos.trBase, muzzle);
6154  AngleVectors(cent->lerpAngles, forward, NULL, NULL);
6155  VectorMA(muzzle, 40, forward, muzzle);
6156  muzzle[2] += DEFAULT_VIEWHEIGHT;
6157  }
6158  }
6159  else if (cent->currentState.eFlags & EF_MOUNTEDTANK)
6160  {
6161  centity_t *tank = &cg_entities[cent->tagParent];
6162 
6163  VectorCopy(tank->mountedMG42Flash.origin, muzzle);
6164  }
6165  else if (cent->currentState.eFlags & EF_AAGUN_ACTIVE)
6166  {
6167  centity_t *aagun = NULL;
6168  int num;
6169 
6170  // find the mg42 we're attached to
6171  for (num = 0; num < cg.snap->numEntities; num++)
6172  {
6173  aagun = &cg_entities[cg.snap->entities[num].number];
6174 
6175  if (aagun->currentState.eType == ET_AAGUN && aagun->currentState.otherEntityNum == cent->currentState.number)
6176  {
6177  // found it
6178  vec3_t forward, right, up;
6179 
6180  AngleVectors(cg.snap->ps.viewangles, forward, right, up);
6181  VectorCopy(aagun->lerpOrigin, muzzle); // modelindex2 will already have been incremented on the server, so work out what it WAS then
6182  BG_AdjustAAGunMuzzleForBarrel(muzzle, forward, right, up, (aagun->currentState.modelindex2 + 3) % 4);
6183  }
6184  }
6185  }
6186  else
6187  {
6188  VectorCopy(cent->currentState.pos.trBase, muzzle);
6189 
6190  AngleVectors(cent->currentState.apos.trBase, forward, right, up);
6191 
6192  if (cent->currentState.eFlags & EF_PRONE)
6193  {
6194  muzzle[2] += PRONE_VIEWHEIGHT;
6195 
6196  if (CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(cent->currentState.weapon)->type, WEAPON_TYPE_MG | WEAPON_TYPE_SET))
6197  {
6198  VectorMA(muzzle, 36, forward, muzzle);
6199  }
6200  else
6201  {
6202  VectorMA(muzzle, 14, forward, muzzle);
6203  }
6204  }
6205  else
6206  {
6207  muzzle[2] += DEFAULT_VIEWHEIGHT;
6208  VectorMA(muzzle, 14, forward, muzzle);
6209  AddLean(cent->lerpAngles, muzzle, cent->pe.leanDirection);
6210  }
6211  }
6212 
6213  return qtrue;
6214 }
6215 
6221 void SnapVectorTowards(vec3_t v, vec3_t to)
6222 {
6223  int i;
6224 
6225  for (i = 0 ; i < 3 ; i++)
6226  {
6227  if (to[i] <= v[i])
6228  {
6229  v[i] = (float)floor((double)v[i]);
6230  }
6231  else
6232  {
6233  v[i] = (float)ceil((double)v[i]);
6234  }
6235  }
6236 }
6237 
6245 void CG_DrawBulletTracer(vec3_t pstart, vec3_t pend, int sourceEntityNum, int otherEntityNum)
6246 {
6247  if (cg_tracers.integer == 2 && sourceEntityNum != cg.clientNum)
6248  {
6249  return; // Only own tracers
6250  }
6251 
6252  if (cg_tracers.integer == 3 && sourceEntityNum == cg.clientNum)
6253  {
6254  return; // Only others tracers
6255  }
6256 
6257  if (sourceEntityNum >= 0 && sourceEntityNum != ENTITYNUM_NONE && cg_tracers.integer <= 3)
6258  {
6259  CG_SpawnTracer(sourceEntityNum, pstart, pend);
6260  }
6261 }
6262 
6273 void CG_Bullet(int weapon, vec3_t end, int sourceEntityNum, qboolean flesh, int fleshEntityNum, int otherEntNum2, float waterfraction, int seed)
6274 {
6275  trace_t trace, trace2;
6276  vec3_t dir;
6277  vec3_t start = { 0, 0, 0 };
6278  static int lastBloodSpat;
6279 
6280  if (sourceEntityNum < 0 || sourceEntityNum >= MAX_GENTITIES)
6281  {
6282  return;
6283  }
6284 
6285  // don't ever shoot if we're binoced in
6286  if (cg_entities[sourceEntityNum].currentState.eFlags & EF_ZOOMING)
6287  {
6288  return;
6289  }
6290 
6291  // hack for fixed/mounted MG
6292  if (BG_PlayerMounted(cg_entities[sourceEntityNum].currentState.eFlags))
6293  {
6294  if (cg_entities[sourceEntityNum].currentState.eFlags & EF_MOUNTEDTANK)
6295  {
6296  if (IS_MOUNTED_TANK_BROWNING(sourceEntityNum))
6297  {
6298  weapon = WP_MOBILE_BROWNING;
6299  }
6300  else
6301  {
6302  weapon = WP_MOBILE_MG42;
6303  }
6304  }
6305  else if (cg_entities[sourceEntityNum].currentState.eFlags & EF_AAGUN_ACTIVE)
6306  {
6307  // TODO
6308  }
6309  else
6310  {
6311  weapon = WP_MOBILE_MG42;
6312  }
6313  }
6314 
6315  // snap tracers for MG42 to viewangle of client when antilag is enabled
6316  if (cgs.antilag && otherEntNum2 == cg.snap->ps.clientNum && (cg_entities[otherEntNum2].currentState.eFlags & EF_MG42_ACTIVE)) // FIXME: AAGUN
6317  {
6318  vec3_t muzzle, forward, right, up;
6319  float r, u;
6320  trace_t tr;
6321 
6322  AngleVectors(cg.predictedPlayerState.viewangles, forward, right, up);
6323  VectorCopy(cg_entities[cg.snap->ps.viewlocked_entNum].currentState.pos.trBase, muzzle);
6324 
6325  if (cg_entities[cg.snap->ps.viewlocked_entNum].currentState.onFireStart)
6326  {
6327  VectorMA(muzzle, 16, up, muzzle);
6328  }
6329 
6330  r = Q_crandom(&seed) * GetWeaponTableData(WP_DUMMY_MG42)->spread;
6331  u = Q_crandom(&seed) * GetWeaponTableData(WP_DUMMY_MG42)->spread;
6332 
6333  VectorMA(muzzle, MAX_TRACE, forward, end);
6334  VectorMA(end, r, right, end);
6335  VectorMA(end, u, up, end);
6336 
6337  cg.bulletTrace = qtrue;
6338  CG_Trace(&tr, muzzle, NULL, NULL, end, otherEntNum2, MASK_SHOT);
6339  cg.bulletTrace = qfalse;
6340 
6341  SnapVectorTowards(tr.endpos, muzzle);
6342  VectorCopy(tr.endpos, end);
6343  }
6344 
6345  // if the shooter is currently valid, calc a source point and possibly
6346  // do trail effects
6347  if (cg_tracerChance.value > 0)
6348  {
6349  if (CG_CalcMuzzlePoint(sourceEntityNum, start))
6350  {
6351  int sourceContentType;
6352  int destContentType;
6353 
6354  sourceContentType = CG_PointContents(start, 0);
6355  destContentType = CG_PointContents(end, 0);
6356 
6357  // do a complete bubble trail if necessary
6358  if ((sourceContentType == destContentType) && (sourceContentType & CONTENTS_WATER))
6359  {
6360  CG_BubbleTrail(start, end, .5, 8);
6361  }
6362  else if ((sourceContentType & CONTENTS_WATER)) // bubble trail from water into air
6363  {
6364  trap_CM_BoxTrace(&trace, end, start, NULL, NULL, 0, CONTENTS_WATER);
6365  CG_BubbleTrail(start, trace.endpos, .5, 8);
6366  }
6367  else if ((destContentType & CONTENTS_WATER)) // bubble trail from air into water
6368  { // only add bubbles if effect is close to viewer
6369  if (Distance(cg.snap->ps.origin, end) < 1024)
6370  {
6371  trap_CM_BoxTrace(&trace, start, end, NULL, NULL, 0, CONTENTS_WATER);
6372  CG_BubbleTrail(end, trace.endpos, .5, 8);
6373  }
6374  }
6375 
6376  if (cg_tracers.integer)
6377  {
6378  // if not flesh, then do a moving tracer
6379  if (flesh)
6380  {
6381  // draw a tracer
6382  if (random() < cg_tracerChance.value)
6383  {
6384  CG_Tracer(start, end, 0);
6385  }
6386  }
6387  else // (not flesh)
6388  {
6389  CG_DrawBulletTracer(start, end, sourceEntityNum, otherEntNum2);
6390  }
6391  }
6392  }
6393  }
6394 
6395  // impact splash and mark
6396  if (flesh)
6397  {
6398  vec3_t origin;
6399  float rnd, tmpf;
6400  vec3_t smokedir, tmpv, tmpv2;
6401  int i, headshot;
6402  centity_t *cent = &cg_entities[fleshEntityNum];
6403 
6404  if (fleshEntityNum < MAX_CLIENTS)
6405  {
6406  CG_Bleed(end, fleshEntityNum);
6407  }
6408 
6409  // smoke puffs (sometimes with some blood)
6410  VectorSubtract(end, start, smokedir); // get a nice "through the body" vector
6411  VectorNormalize(smokedir);
6412  // all this to come up with a decent center-body displacement of bullet impact point
6413  VectorSubtract(cent->currentState.pos.trBase, end, tmpv);
6414  tmpv[2] = 0;
6415  tmpf = VectorLength(tmpv);
6416  VectorScale(smokedir, tmpf, tmpv);
6417  VectorAdd(end, tmpv, origin);
6418  // whee, got a bullet impact point projected to center body
6419  CG_GetOriginForTag(cent, &cent->pe.headRefEnt, "tag_mouth", 0, tmpv, NULL);
6420  tmpv[2] += 5;
6421  VectorSubtract(tmpv, origin, tmpv2);
6422  headshot = (VectorLength(tmpv2) < 10);
6423 
6424  if (headshot && cg_blood.integer)
6425  {
6426  for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
6427  {
6428  rnd = random();
6429  VectorScale(smokedir, 25.0f + random() * 25, tmpv);
6430  tmpv[0] += crandom() * 25.0f;
6431  tmpv[1] += crandom() * 25.0f;
6432  tmpv[2] += crandom() * 25.0f;
6433  CG_GetWindVector(tmpv2);
6434  VectorScale(tmpv2, 35, tmpv2); // was 75, before that 55
6435  tmpv2[2] = 0;
6436  VectorAdd(tmpv, tmpv2, tmpv);
6437  CG_SmokePuff(origin, tmpv, 5 + rnd * 10, 1, rnd * 0.8f, rnd * 0.8f, 0.5, 500 + (rand() % 800), cg.time, 0, 0, cgs.media.fleshSmokePuffShader);
6438  }
6439  }
6440  else
6441  {
6442  // puff out the front (more dust no blood)
6443  for (i = 0; i < 10; i++)
6444  {
6445  rnd = random();
6446  VectorScale(smokedir, -35.0f + random() * 25, tmpv);
6447  tmpv[0] += crandom() * 25.0f;
6448  tmpv[1] += crandom() * 25.0f;
6449  tmpv[2] += crandom() * 25.0f;
6450  CG_GetWindVector(tmpv2);
6451  VectorScale(tmpv2, 35, tmpv2); // was 75, before that 55
6452  tmpv2[2] = 0;
6453  VectorAdd(tmpv, tmpv2, tmpv);
6454  CG_SmokePuff(origin, tmpv, 5 + rnd * 10, rnd * 0.3f + 0.5f, rnd * 0.3f + 0.5f, rnd * 0.3f + 0.5f, 0.125f, 500 + (rand() % 300), cg.time, 0, 0, cgs.media.smokePuffShader);
6455  }
6456  }
6457 
6458  // play the bullet hit flesh sound
6459  CG_MissileHitWall(weapon, PS_FX_FLESH, cg_entities[fleshEntityNum].currentState.origin, smokedir, 0, fleshEntityNum);
6460 
6461  // if we haven't dropped a blood spat in a while, check if this is a good scenario
6462  if (cg_blood.integer && cg_bloodTime.integer && (lastBloodSpat > cg.time || lastBloodSpat < cg.time - 500))
6463  {
6464  if (CG_CalcMuzzlePoint(sourceEntityNum, start))
6465  {
6466  vec3_t trend;
6467  vec4_t projection;
6468 
6469  VectorSubtract(end, start, dir);
6470  VectorNormalize(dir);
6471  VectorMA(end, 128, dir, trend);
6472  trap_CM_BoxTrace(&trace, end, trend, NULL, NULL, 0, MASK_SHOT & ~CONTENTS_BODY);
6473 
6474  if (trace.fraction < 1)
6475  {
6476  //CG_ImpactMark( cgs.media.bloodDotShaders[rand()%5], trace.endpos, trace.plane.normal, random()*360,
6477  // 1,1,1,1, qtrue, 15+random()*20, qfalse, cg_bloodTime.integer * 1000 );
6478 #if 0
6479  VectorSubtract(vec3_origin, dir, projection);
6480  projection[3] = 64;
6481  VectorMA(trace.endpos, -8.0f, projection, markOrigin);
6482  CG_ImpactMark(cgs.media.bloodDotShaders[rand() % 5], markOrigin, projection, 15.0f + random() * 20.0f, 360.0f * random(),
6483  1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, cg_bloodTime.integer * 1000);
6484 #else
6485  VectorSet(projection, 0, 0, -1);
6486  projection[3] = 15.0f + random() * 20.0f;
6487 
6488  trap_R_ProjectDecal(cgs.media.bloodDotShaders[rand() % 5], 1, (vec3_t *) origin, projection, colorWhite,
6489  cg_bloodTime.integer * 1000, (cg_bloodTime.integer * 1000) >> 4);
6490 #endif
6491  lastBloodSpat = cg.time;
6492  }
6493  else if (lastBloodSpat < cg.time - 1000)
6494  {
6495  // drop one on the ground?
6496  VectorCopy(end, trend);
6497  trend[2] -= 64;
6498  trap_CM_BoxTrace(&trace, end, trend, NULL, NULL, 0, MASK_SHOT & ~CONTENTS_BODY);
6499 
6500  if (trace.fraction < 1)
6501  {
6502  //CG_ImpactMark( cgs.media.bloodDotShaders[rand()%5], trace.endpos, trace.plane.normal, random()*360,
6503  // 1,1,1,1, qtrue, 15+random()*10, qfalse, cg_bloodTime.integer * 1000 );
6504 #if 0
6505  VectorSubtract(vec3_origin, dir, projection);
6506  projection[3] = 64;
6507  VectorMA(trace.endpos, -8.0f, projection, markOrigin);
6508  CG_ImpactMark(cgs.media.bloodDotShaders[rand() % 5], markOrigin, projection, 15.0f + random() * 10.0f, 360.0f * random(),
6509  1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, cg_bloodTime.integer * 1000);
6510 #else
6511  VectorSet(projection, 0, 0, -1);
6512  projection[3] = 15.0f + random() * 20.0f;
6513 
6514  trap_R_ProjectDecal(cgs.media.bloodDotShaders[rand() % 5], 1, (vec3_t *) origin, projection, colorWhite,
6515  cg_bloodTime.integer * 1000, (cg_bloodTime.integer * 1000) >> 4);
6516 #endif
6517  lastBloodSpat = cg.time;
6518  }
6519  }
6520  }
6521  }
6522  }
6523  else // (not flesh)
6524  {
6525  if (CG_CalcMuzzlePoint(sourceEntityNum, start) || cg.snap->ps.persistant[PERS_HWEAPON_USE])
6526  {
6527  if (waterfraction != 0.f)
6528  {
6529  vec3_t dist;
6530  vec3_t end2;
6531  vec3_t dir = { 0, 0, 1 };
6532 
6533  VectorSubtract(end, start, dist);
6534  VectorMA(start, waterfraction, dist, end2);
6535 
6536  CG_MissileHitWall(weapon, PS_FX_WATER, end2, dir, 0, -1);
6537  CG_MissileHitWall(weapon, PS_FX_COMMON, end, trace.plane.normal, 0, -1);
6538  }
6539  else
6540  {
6541  VectorSubtract(end, start, dir);
6542  VectorNormalizeFast(dir);
6543  VectorMA(end, 4, dir, end);
6544 
6545  cg.bulletTrace = qtrue;
6546  CG_Trace(&trace, start, NULL, NULL, end, 0, MASK_SHOT);
6547 
6548  // water check
6549  CG_Trace(&trace2, start, NULL, NULL, end, 0, MASK_WATER | MASK_SHOT);
6550  cg.bulletTrace = qfalse;
6551 
6552  if (trace.fraction != trace2.fraction)
6553  {
6554  cg.bulletTrace = qtrue;
6555  CG_Trace(&trace2, start, NULL, NULL, end, -1, MASK_WATER);
6556  cg.bulletTrace = qfalse;
6557 
6558  CG_MissileHitWall(weapon, PS_FX_WATER, trace2.endpos, trace2.plane.normal, trace2.surfaceFlags, -1);
6559  return;
6560  }
6561 
6562  // better bullet marks
6563  VectorSubtract(vec3_origin, dir, dir);
6564 
6565  CG_MissileHitWall(weapon, PS_FX_COMMON, trace.endpos, dir, trace.surfaceFlags, -1);
6566  }
6567  }
6568  }
6569 }

getPrevWeapInBank
static int getPrevWeapInBank(int bank, int cycle)
Pass in a bank and cycle and this will return the next valid weapon lower in the cycle. if the weap passed in is the lowest in a cycle (0), this will loop around to the top (MAX_WEAPS_IN_BANK-1) and start down from there looking for a valid weapon position.

getPrevBankWeap
static int getPrevBankWeap(int bank, int cycle, qboolean sameBankPosition)
Pass in a bank and cycle and this will return the next valid weapon in a lower bank. sameBankPosition: if there&#39;s a weapon in the prev bank at the same cycle, return that (thompson returns colt for example) rather than the highest weapon.

getNextBankWeap
static int getNextBankWeap(int bank, int cycle, qboolean sameBankPosition)
Pass in a bank and cycle and this will return the next valid weapon in a higher bank. sameBankPosition: if there&#39;s a weapon in the next bank at the same cycle, return that (colt returns thompson for example) rather than the lowest weapon.
